rows.name: Acid Fog
rows.short_description: Billowing acid fog slows sight/movement and deals 2d6 acid damage each round.

rows.name: Acid Splash
rows.short_description: Ranged touch attack; 1d3 acid damage.

rows.name: Aid
rows.short_description: +1 morale on attacks and saves vs. fear; 1d8 + caster level (max +10) temporary hp.

rows.name: Air Walk
rows.short_description: Subject walks on air as if solid; can ascend/descend at 45°; winds can push the subject.

rows.name: Alarm
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
rows.short_description: Wards an area; mental ‘ping’ to you or audible bell when creatures enter.

rows.name: Align Weapon
rows.target: Weapon touched or fifty projectiles (all in contact at casting)
rows.short_description: Makes a weapon good/evil/lawful/chaotic to bypass DR; not usable on natural weapons.

rows.name: Alter Self
rows.short_description: Assume the form of a same-type creature within one size; gain its physical qualities.

rows.name: Analyze Dweomer
rows.target: One object or creature per caster level
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Reveals spells on creatures/objects and magic item functions; attended objects may save.

rows.name: Animal Growth
rows.target: Up to one animal (Gargantuan or smaller) per two levels, no two of which are more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Doubles animals’ size; +8 Str, +4 Con, –2 Dex, +2 natural armor; DR 10/magic; +4 on saves.

rows.name: Animal Messenger
rows.short_description: Compels a Tiny animal to carry a message to a designated location.

rows.name: Animal Shapes
rows.target: Up to one willing creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Transforms multiple willing creatures into the same animal forms; each can revert individually.

rows.name: Animal Trance
rows.target: Animals or magical beasts with Intelligence 1 or 2
rows.short_description: Fascinates 2d6 HD of low-Int animals or magical beasts with music or chanting.

rows.name: Animate Dead
rows.short_description: Creates skeletons or zombies under your control (HD limits; black onyx material).

rows.name: Animate Objects
rows.target: One Small object per caster level; see text
rows.short_description: Animates nonmagical objects (size-based counts) to attack; you can retarget as a move action.

rows.name: Animate Plants
rows.target: One Large plant per three caster levels or all plants within range; see text
rows.short_description: Animates plants as attackers or causes all plants in range to entangle creatures.

rows.name: Animate Rope
rows.target: One ropelike object, length up to 50 ft. + 5 ft./level; see text
rows.short_description: Commands rope to coil, loop, knot, or entangle on a hit; +2 bonus on your Use Rope checks.

rows.name: Antilife Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile field hedges out living creatures except constructs, elementals, outsiders, and undead.

rows.name: Antimagic Field
rows.short_description: Suppresses magic in area; summoned/incorporeal creatures wink out; magic items function as mundane.

rows.name: Antiplant Shell
rows.short_description: Mobile barrier keeps plant creatures and animated plants at bay.

rows.name: Antipathy
rows.target: One location (up to a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
rows.short_description: Object or area repels a specified creature kind or alignment; failed save forces shunning.

rows.name: Arcane Eye
rows.short_description: Invisible sensor transmits sight; moves 30 ft./round (10 ft. when scanning surfaces).

rows.name: Arcane Lock
rows.target: The door, chest, or portal touched, up to 30 sq. ft./level in size
rows.short_description: Magically locks a portal; +10 to break DC; knock suppresses for 10 minutes; caster can pass freely.

rows.name: Arcane Mark
rows.short_description: Inscribes your personal rune (visible or invisible) on any surface without harm.

rows.name: Arcane Sight
rows.short_description: See locations and strengths of magical auras within 120 ft.; identify schools with Spellcraft.

rows.name: Arcane Sight, Greater
rows.short_description: As arcane sight, plus you automatically know which spells or magic effects are active on what you see.

rows.name: Astral Projection
rows.target: You plus one additional willing creature touched per two caster levels
rows.short_description: Projects astral bodies linked by silver cords to travel planes; bodies left in suspended animation.

rows.name: Atonement
rows.short_description: Removes burden of misdeeds or restores class/spell powers; deliberate cases cost 500 XP.

rows.name: Augury
rows.short_description: Predicts weal, woe, both, or nothing for an action within ~30 minutes (70% +1%/level, max 90%).

rows.name: Awaken
rows.short_description: Grants animal or tree sentience and speech (friendly to you); XP cost.

rows.name: Baleful Polymorph
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude negates, Will partial; see text
rows.short_description: Transforms target into a Small or smaller 1-HD animal; retains alignment and hp; Will save may retain mind.

rows.name: Bane
rows.short_description: Enemies take –1 on attack rolls and –1 on saves vs. fear; counters and dispels bless.

rows.name: Banishment
rows.target: One or more extraplanar creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Forces extraplanar creatures back to their home plane; bonuses with distasteful foci.

rows.name: Barkskin
rows.short_description: +2 enhancement to natural armor (+1/3 levels above 3rd, to +5).

rows.name: Bear’s Endurance
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Constitution.

rows.name: Bear’s Endurance, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As bear’s endurance, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Bestow Curse
rows.short_description: –6 to an ability score, or –4 on attacks/saves/ability/skill checks, or 50% chance to do nothing each turn.

rows.name: Bigby’s Clenched Fist
rows.short_description: Large force hand that interposes, pushes, or strikes; on hit 1d8+11 damage and Fort save or stunned 1 round.

rows.name: Bigby’s Crushing Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand grapples (deals 2d6+12 on grapple) or interposes/bull rushes with strong bonuses.

rows.name: Bigby’s Forceful Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand pursues and bull rushes designated opponent with a +14 Strength check bonus.

rows.name: Bigby’s Grasping Hand
rows.short_description: Force hand grapples and holds, can bull rush or interpose.

rows.name: Bigby’s Interposing Hand
rows.short_description: Large force hand provides cover and slows foes trying to pass; persists between you and one target.

rows.name: Binding
rows.short_description: Magically restrains a creature in various forms (chaining, slumber, prisons, etc.) with optional triggers.

rows.name: Blade Barrier
rows.saving_throw: Reflex half or Reflex negates; see text
rows.short_description: Immobile wall of force blades deals 1d6/level (max 15d6) to creatures passing through; provides cover.

rows.name: Blasphemy
rows.area: Nonevil creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Harms nonevil creatures by HD (daze/weaken/paralyze/kill); banishes nonevil extraplanar creatures on home plane.

rows.name: Bless
rows.area: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst, centered on the caster
rows.short_description: Allies gain +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saves vs. fear; counters and dispels bane.

rows.name: Bless Water
rows.short_description: Makes holy water in a flask.

rows.name: Bless Weapon
rows.short_description: Weapon counts as good and as +1 for bypassing DR vs. evil; auto-confirms critical threats vs. evil foes.

rows.name: Blight
rows.short_description: Withers a plant; plant creatures take 1d6/level (max 15d6).

rows.name: Blindness/Deafness
rows.short_description: Makes subject blinded or deafened.

rows.name: Blink
rows.short_description: You randomly flicker between Material and Ethereal; attacks vs. you 50% miss (often 20%); many other effects.

rows.name: Blur
rows.short_description: Subject gains concealment (20% miss chance).

rows.name: Break Enchantment
rows.target: Up to one creature per level, all within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses; CL check vs. 11 + effect’s CL (max +15).

rows.name: Bull’s Strength
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Strength.

rows.name: Bull’s Strength, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As bull’s strength, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Burning Hands
rows.short_description: Cone of flame deals 1d4/level (max 5d4); ignites combustibles.

rows.name: Call Lightning
rows.short_description: Call one 5-ft.-wide, 30-ft.-long bolt/round (max CL bolts), 3d6 damage (3d10 outdoors in storm).

rows.name: Call Lightning Storm
rows.short_description: As call lightning, but each bolt deals 5d6 (or 5d10 outdoors in storm), max 15 bolts.

rows.name: Calm Animals
rows.target: Animals within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: Soothes ordinary animals (Int 1–2); pacifies 2d4 + caster level HD; trained/ dire animals get a save.

rows.name: Calm Emotions
rows.short_description: Suppresses emotion effects (rage, fear, bardic music, morale bonuses) and prevents violent acts.

rows.name: Cat’s Grace
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Dexterity.

rows.name: Cat’s Grace, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As cat’s grace, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Cause Fear
rows.target: One living creature with 5 or fewer HD
rows.short_description: Subject with ≤5 HD is frightened (or shaken 1 round on save); creatures with 6+ HD are immune.

rows.name: Chain Lightning
rows.target: One primary target, plus one secondary target/level (each within 30 ft. of the primary target)
rows.short_description: Primary bolt 1d6/level (max 20d6); arcs to up to CL secondary targets for half damage.

rows.name: Changestaff
rows.short_description: Your prepared quarterstaff becomes a Huge treantlike guardian that obeys you.

rows.name: Chaos Hammer
rows.short_description: Damages lawful creatures (1d8/2 levels or 1d6/level vs. lawful outsiders) and slows them; half damage to neutrals.

rows.name: Charm Animal
rows.short_description: As charm person, but affects an animal.

rows.name: Charm Monster
rows.short_description: As charm person, but any creature.

rows.name: Charm Monster, Mass
rows.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As charm monster, but affects multiple creatures up to 2× caster level total HD (min 1 creature).

rows.name: Charm Person
rows.short_description: Makes one humanoid regard you as a trusted friend; +5 save if you or allies are threatening.

rows.name: Chill Metal
rows.target: Metal equipment of one creature per two levels (no two more than 30 ft. apart); or 25 lb. of metal/level, contiguous
rows.short_description: Makes metal icy cold; damages creatures wearing/carrying it per round; counters heat metal.

rows.name: Chill Touch
rows.target: Creature or creatures touched (up to one/level)
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude partial or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Touch deals 1d6 damage and 1 Str damage (Fort negates Str); undead must Will save or flee.

rows.name: Circle of Death
rows.area: Several living creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Kills 1d4 HD/level of living creatures (max 20d4), starting with lowest HD; no effect on 9+ HD creatures.

rows.name: Clairaudience/Clairvoyance
rows.short_description: Creates unseen sensor at a known locale to hear or see; sensor is stationary.

rows.name: Cloak of Chaos
rows.target: One creature/level in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: +4 deflection AC and +4 resistance saves, SR 25 vs. lawful; blocks mental control; melee attackers (lawful) are confused 1 round (Will negates).

rows.name: Clone
rows.short_description: Creates inert duplicate to receive soul if original dies; grows over 2d4 months.

rows.name: Cloudkill
rows.short_description: Poisonous fog kills ≤3 HD, harms 4–6 HD and higher; heavy gas rolls away from you.

rows.name: Color Spray
rows.short_description: Cone of colors stuns/blinds/unconscious by HD (2- HD worst).

rows.name: Command
rows.short_description: Subject obeys a one-word command (approach, drop, fall, flee, halt).

rows.name: Command, Greater
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will negates (new save each round after the first)
rows.short_description: As command, but affects multiple creatures and lasts longer; each gets a new save each round after the first.

rows.name: Command Plants
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of plant creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As charm effect for plant creatures; you can influence their actions with opposed Charisma checks.

rows.name: Command Undead
rows.short_description: Control one undead; mindless get no save; intelligent act as if charmed; hostile acts break the spell.

rows.name: Commune
rows.short_description: Ask your deity yes/no questions (one per two CL in SRD; here one/CL per text) with concise answers; risk of “unclear.”

rows.name: Commune with Nature
rows.short_description: Learn up to three facts about the surrounding natural terrain and denizens (range varies by environment).

rows.name: Comprehend Languages
rows.short_description: Understand spoken or written language you touch; reads ~1 page/minute; doesn’t decode ciphers.

rows.name: Cone of Cold
rows.short_description: Deals 1d6/level cold damage (max 15d6) in a cone.

rows.name: Confusion
rows.short_description: Subjects behave randomly each round (attack, babble, flee, or act normally).

rows.name: Confusion, Lesser
rows.short_description: One creature is confused for 1 round.

rows.name: Consecrate
rows.short_description: Fills area with positive energy; +3 on turn checks; undead take –1 on attacks/damage/saves; doubles effects if allied altar present.

rows.name: Contact Other Plane
rows.short_description: Ask planar powers yes/no questions; risk temporary Int/Cha loss; accuracy depends on plane/deity rank.

rows.name: Contagion
rows.short_description: Infects subject with chosen disease (strikes immediately); later saves use disease DC.

rows.name: Contingency
rows.short_description: Sets a spell of up to 1/3 your CL (max 6th) to trigger automatically under specified conditions.

rows.name: Continual Flame
rows.short_description: Object shines like a torch without heat; can be covered but not quenched.

rows.name: Control Plants
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of plant creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Command the actions of plant creatures for a short time; suicidal orders ignored.

rows.name: Control Undead
rows.target: Up to 2 HD/level of undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Command multiple undead for a short time; intelligent undead remember being controlled.

rows.name: Control Water
rows.area: Water in a volume of 10 ft./level by 10 ft./level by 2 ft./level (S)
rows.short_description: Raises or lowers bodies of water; can slow water creatures (as slow) on a save; forms whirlpools in deep water.

rows.name: Control Weather
rows.area: 2-mile-radius circle, centered on you; see text
rows.short_description: Changes local weather appropriate to climate/season; adjust wind and general conditions.

rows.name: Control Winds
rows.short_description: Alters wind direction/strength within a large cylinder; can form tornado/hurricane effects; creatures save each round.

rows.name: Create Food and Water
rows.short_description: Creates simple, nourishing food (spoils in 24 hours) and clean water (does not spoil).

rows.name: Create Greater Undead
rows.short_description: As create undead but creates stronger undead (shadow, wraith, spectre, devourer) based on caster level; must be cast at night; requires black onyx gems.

rows.name: Create Undead
rows.short_description: Creates a ghoul, ghast, mummy, or mohrg based on caster level; undead aren’t automatically under your control; must be cast at night and uses black onyx (50 gp/HD).

rows.name: Create Water
rows.short_description: Creates clean, drinkable water (about 8 lb./gallon).

rows.name: Creeping Doom
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)/100 ft.; see text
rows.short_description: Summons up to one centipede swarm/2 levels (max 10) you can command within 100 ft.

rows.name: Crushing Despair
rows.short_description: Creatures in cone take –2 on attacks, saves, ability/skill checks, and weapon damage; counters/dispels good hope.

rows.name: Cure Critical Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 4d8 +1/level (max +20) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Critical Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 4d8 +1/level (max +40) to multiple creatures; harms undead.

rows.name: Cure Light Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 1d8 +1/level (max +5) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Light Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: Heals 1d8 +1/level (max +25) to each of multiple targets; harms undead (Will half).

rows.name: Cure Minor Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 1 hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Moderate Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 2d8 +1/level (max +10) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 2d8 +1/level (max +30); harms undead.

rows.name: Cure Serious Wounds
rows.short_description: Cures 3d8 +1/level (max +15) hp; damages undead (Will half; SR applies).

rows.name: Cure Serious Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will half (harmless) or Will half; see text
rows.short_description: As mass cure light wounds but heals 3d8 +1/level (max +35); harms undead.

rows.name: Curse Water
rows.short_description: Imbues 1 pint of water with negative energy, creating unholy water.

rows.name: Dancing Lights
rows.short_description: Create up to four moving lights that must remain within a 10-ft. radius of each other.

rows.name: Darkness
rows.short_description: Object radiates shadowy illumination in 20-ft. radius; grants concealment; counters/dispelled by equal or lower light spells.

rows.name: Darkvision
rows.short_description: Subject can see 60 ft. in total darkness (black-and-white vision only).

rows.name: Daylight
rows.short_description: Object shines like daylight: bright light 60 ft., dim light +60 ft.; counters darkness of equal or lower level.

rows.name: Daze
rows.target: One humanoid creature of 4 HD or less
rows.short_description: One humanoid of 4 HD or less loses action for 1 round.

rows.name: Daze Monster
rows.target: One living creature of 6 HD or less
rows.short_description: As daze, but affects any living creature of 6 HD or less.

rows.name: Death Knell
rows.duration: Instantaneous/10 minutes per HD of subject; see text
rows.short_description: Slay a dying creature; you gain 1d8 temp hp, +2 Str, and +1 caster level for 10 minutes/HD.

rows.name: Death Ward
rows.short_description: Immunity to death spells/effects, energy drain, and negative energy effects.

rows.name: Deathwatch
rows.short_description: Know the condition of creatures near death in a cone; pierces feign death effects.

rows.name: Deep Slumber
rows.area: One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: As sleep but affects up to 10 HD of creatures.

rows.name: Deeper Darkness
rows.short_description: As darkness but 60-ft. radius and longer duration; counters/dispel light of equal or lower level.

rows.name: Delay Poison
rows.short_description: Subject is immune to poison effects for the duration (existing poison is suspended).

rows.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
rows.short_description: As fireball but 1d6/level (max 20d6) and you may delay the detonation up to 5 rounds.

rows.name: Demand
rows.short_description: As sending, but message (≤25 words) includes a suggestion the subject tries to carry out; target may reply briefly.

rows.name: Desecrate
rows.short_description: Fills area with negative energy: –3 on turning checks; undead gain +1 on attacks, damage, saves, and +1 hp/HD; effects double near your deity’s altar; can instead curse rival deity’s site; counters/dispels consecrate.

rows.name: Destruction
rows.short_description: Instantly slays and utterly consumes target on a failed save; on a successful save, target takes 10d6 damage. Only true resurrection, wish+resurrection, or miracle can restore the slain.

rows.name: Detect Animals or Plants
rows.short_description: Choose a kind; learn presence, then number/health, then exact locations/conditions of that animal or plant in a cone.

rows.name: Detect Chaos
rows.short_description: As detect evil but reveals chaotic auras (creatures, spells, items); overwhelming chaos can stun lawful casters.

rows.name: Detect Evil
rows.short_description: Reveals evil auras and their strength; lingering auras persist; overwhelming evil can stun good casters (if source is ≥2× level).

rows.name: Detect Good
rows.short_description: As detect evil, but detects good auras; overwhelming good can stun evil casters.

rows.name: Detect Law
rows.short_description: As detect evil, but detects lawful auras; overwhelming law can stun chaotic casters.

rows.name: Detect Magic
rows.short_description: Detects magical auras; reveals number/strength and schools with Spellcraft; auras linger; can be made permanent.

rows.name: Detect Poison
rows.short_description: Detects poison in a creature, object, or area; DC 20 Wis or Craft (alchemy) can identify the exact poison; blocked by lead/stone/metal thicknesses.

rows.name: Detect Scrying
rows.short_description: Alerts you to scrying; reveals sensor locations; if the attempt originates within area, learn location; otherwise opposed caster level checks to glimpse the scrier and gauge direction/distance.

rows.name: Detect Secret Doors
rows.short_description: Reveals secret doors/compartments; learn presence, then number/locations, then mechanism/trigger with continued concentration.

rows.name: Detect Snares and Pits
rows.short_description: Detects simple pits, deadfalls, snares, some natural hazards; not complex or magical traps (except snare); reveals presence, then number/locations, then type/trigger.

rows.name: Detect Thoughts
rows.short_description: Detects surface thoughts: presence, then number/Int scores, then thoughts; high Int can stun; must recast to try again after a save.

rows.name: Detect Undead
rows.short_description: Reveals undead auras, their number, strength, and locations; overwhelming auras can stun good casters; auras linger.

rows.name: Dictum
rows.area: Nonlawful creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Nonlawful creatures suffer effects by HD: deafened, slowed, paralyzed, or killed; also banishes nonlawful extraplanar creatures from your home plane (Will –4 negates); unaffected if HD exceed your caster level.

rows.name: Dimension Door
rows.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
rows.short_description: Teleports you (and limited cargo/allies) to a spot in range; if arriving in solid matter, you’re shunted and take damage; no further actions until your next turn.

rows.name: Dimensional Anchor
rows.short_description: Ray bars extradimensional travel (teleport, plane shift, etc.) on the struck creature/object; doesn’t affect astral/ethereal movement already in progress.

rows.name: Dimensional Lock
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a point in space
rows.short_description: Area wards against extradimensional travel (teleport, plane shift, etc.); doesn’t impede astral/ethereal movement already occurring or extradimensional perception/attacks; summoned creatures still depart when their time ends.

rows.name: Diminish Plants
rows.short_description: Prune Growth: trim/untangle normal vegetation in a large area within long range; Stunt Growth: reduce productivity of normal plants within 1/2 mile by one-third for a year; counters plant growth; no effect on plant creatures.

rows.name: Discern Lies
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Know if a subject deliberately and knowingly speaks a lie; does not reveal the truth or unintentional errors; you can switch targets each round.

rows.name: Discern Location
rows.short_description: Reveals exact location (place/building, community, county, country, continent, plane); only mind blank or a deity’s direct intervention blocks; requires prior sight or a personal link (creature) or prior touch (object).

rows.name: Disguise Self
rows.short_description: Change your appearance (1 ft. height change, same body type); +10 on Disguise; tactile and audio unchanged.

rows.name: Disintegrate
rows.short_description: Green ray deals 2d6/level (max 40d6); creatures reduced to 0 or fewer hp are disintegrated; objects: disintegrates up to one 10-ft. cube; Fort save for 5d6 partial.

rows.name: Dismissal
rows.short_description: Sends one extraplanar creature back to its home plane (special Will DC = spell DC − target’s HD + your caster level); 20% chance of wrong plane.

rows.name: Dispel Chaos
rows.target: You and a touched chaotic outsider; or you and a chaotic spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects chaotic creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. chaotic creatures; melee touch can banish chaotic outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one chaotic spell or any one enchantment cast by a chaotic creature.

rows.name: Dispel Evil
rows.target: You and a touched evil outsider; or you and an evil spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: You gain +4 deflection AC vs. evil; melee touch can banish evil outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one evil spell or any one enchantment cast by an evil creature.

rows.name: Dispel Good
rows.target: You and a touched good outsider; or you and a good spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects good creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. good; melee touch can banish good outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one good spell or any one enchantment cast by a good creature.

rows.name: Dispel Law
rows.target: You and a touched lawful outsider; or you and a lawful spell/enchantment on a touched creature or object
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged (whichever comes first)
rows.short_description: As dispel evil, but affects lawful creatures/spells; you gain +4 deflection AC vs. lawful; melee touch can banish lawful outsiders (Will negates); touch can dispel one lawful spell or any one enchantment cast by a lawful creature.

rows.name: Dispel Magic
rows.short_description: Ends ongoing spells, suppresses magic items (1d4 rounds), or counters spells; dispel check 1d20 + caster level (max +10) vs. DC 11 + effect’s caster level.

rows.name: Dispel Magic, Greater
rows.short_description: As dispel magic, but dispel check max +20; can also dispel effects removable by remove curse (even if basic dispel magic can’t).

rows.name: Displacement
rows.short_description: Subject appears 2 ft. from true location; attackers have 50% miss chance as if total concealment; true seeing reveals.

rows.name: Disrupt Undead
rows.short_description: Ray of positive energy deals 1d6 damage to one undead on a hit (ranged touch).

rows.name: Disrupting Weapon
rows.short_description: Touched melee weapon destroys struck undead of HD ≤ your caster level (Will negates; no SR vs. destruction effect).

rows.name: Divination
rows.short_description: Gives useful advice regarding a specific goal/event/activity within 1 week; 70% +1%/level accuracy (max 90%); costly incense/offering (25 gp).

rows.name: Divine Favor
rows.short_description: +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage per three caster levels (min +1, max +3).

rows.name: Divine Power
rows.short_description: Your BAB = character level; +6 enhancement to Str; gain 1 temporary hp/level.

rows.name: Dominate Animal
rows.short_description: Telepathic control of one animal; simple commands; suicidal orders ignored; can direct mentally within range.

rows.name: Dominate Monster
rows.short_description: As dominate person but any creature type; telepathic control, remote range on same plane; new saves for actions against nature.

rows.name: Dominate Person
rows.short_description: Telepathic control of a humanoid; can concentrate for sensory impressions; new saves for actions against nature; protection from evil blocks control while active.

rows.name: Doom
rows.short_description: Subject becomes shaken.

rows.name: Drawmij's Instant Summons
rows.target: One object ≤10 lb. and ≤6 ft. long
rows.short_description: Arcane mark item; inscribe its name on a 1,000 gp sapphire; later speak word and crush gem to summon the item to hand (fails if in a creature’s possession; you learn who/rough location).

rows.name: Dream
rows.short_description: Messenger enters recipient’s dream to deliver any-length message; one-way; fails on creatures that don’t sleep/dream; messenger is helpless while in trance.

rows.name: Eagle's Splendor
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Charisma; affects skills/uses and increases save DCs of Cha-based spells cast during duration (no extra bonus spells).

rows.name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As eagle’s splendor, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Earthquake
rows.short_description: Localized tremor knocks creatures down, opens fissures, collapses structures/roofs/cliffs; details vary by terrain; pinned creatures take ongoing nonlethal damage.

rows.name: Elemental Swarm
rows.short_description: Opens portal to a chosen Elemental Plane; summons 2d4 Large elementals, then 1d4 Huge after 10 min, then one greater after 10 more min; all have max hp and obey; counts as air/earth/fire/water spell matching the element.

rows.name: Endure Elements
rows.short_description: Inures subject to severe heat/cold (–50°F to 140°F) but not energy damage or other hazards.

rows.name: Energy Drain
rows.short_description: Ray bestows 2d4 negative levels (no save to gain); 24 hours later each requires Fort save or victim loses a level; undead instead gain 10×(2d4) temp hp for 1 hour.

rows.name: Enervation
rows.short_description: Ray gives 1d4 negative levels; if negative levels ≥ HD, target dies; undead gain 5×(1d4) temp hp for 1 hour.

rows.name: Enlarge Person
rows.short_description: Humanoid doubles height (one size larger): +2 Str, –2 Dex (min 1), –1 attack/AC; gear enlarges; thrown/projectile damage rules apply; counters/dispels reduce person.

rows.name: Enlarge Person, Mass
rows.target: One humanoid creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As enlarge person, but multiple creatures.

rows.name: Entangle
rows.short_description: Plants grab creatures; entangled or half speed with Reflex save; checks to break free; reattempts each round.

rows.name: Enthrall
rows.short_description: Audience is captivated as you speak/sing; most become friendly/indifferent; new saves if opposed actions; ends on hostility; heckling group can break effect.

rows.name: Entropic Shield
rows.short_description: Shimmering field gives 20% miss chance vs. ranged attacks that require an attack roll (including rays).

rows.name: Erase
rows.short_description: Removes magical or mundane writing; auto-erases unattended mundane text; magic text requires CL check vs. DC 15; failure on certain wards triggers them.

rows.name: Ethereal Jaunt
rows.short_description: You become ethereal; move through objects, see/hear 60 ft. into Material; force/abjuration effects affect you; ending inside matter shunts you and deals 1d6/5 ft.

rows.name: Etherealness
rows.target: You and one other touched creature per three levels
rows.short_description: As ethereal jaunt but you and linked willing creatures become ethereal; on expiration all return to the Material Plane.

rows.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
rows.short_description: Rubbery tentacles grapple (+8 + caster level) and crush for 1d6+4 each round; creatures entering are attacked; movement through area is halved.

rows.name: Expeditious Retreat
rows.short_description: Your base land speed increases by 30 ft. (enhancement).

rows.name: Explosive Runes
rows.target: One touched object weighing no more than 10 lb.
rows.short_description: Placed on writing; detonates for 6d6 force when read; reader takes full, others within 10 ft. Reflex half; DC to find/disable = 25 + spell level.

rows.name: Eyebite
rows.short_description: Each round target you choose suffers effects by HD: 10+ sickened; 5–9 panicked then shaken; 4− comatose, panicked, sickened.

rows.name: Fabricate
rows.target: Up to 10 cu. ft./level of material (1 cu. ft./level for minerals)
rows.short_description: Convert raw material into finished items of the same substance; requires appropriate Craft check; 1 round/10 cu. ft. (or 1 cu. ft. for minerals).

rows.name: Faerie Fire
rows.area: Creatures and objects within a 5-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Outlines subjects with dim colored light; negates benefits of concealment from darkness, blur, displacement, invisibility (but not higher magical darkness).

rows.name: False Life
rows.short_description: Gain 1d10 +1/level (max +10) temporary hit points.

rows.name: False Vision
rows.short_description: Scrying shows a major image you define; you can concentrate to alter it during the duration.

rows.name: Fear
rows.short_description: Creatures in cone become panicked on failed save (cower if cornered); on success, shaken for 1 round.

rows.name: Feather Fall
rows.target: One Medium or smaller free-falling object or creature/level, no two of which may be more than 20 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Targets fall at 60 ft./round and take no damage on landing while active; can be cast out of turn as a free action.

rows.name: Feeblemind
rows.short_description: Target’s Int and Cha drop to 1; loses Int/Cha-based skills, speech, language, and spellcasting; arcane casters take −4 on the save; heal/limited wish/miracle/wish ends.

rows.name: Find the Path
rows.short_description: Reveals shortest, most direct physical route to a specified location; can free subject from maze in 1 round.

rows.name: Find Traps
rows.short_description: You can use Search to detect traps like a rogue and gain +½ level (max +10) insight bonus on Search checks to find traps.

rows.name: Finger of Death
rows.short_description: Slays one living creature (Fort negates); on a successful save deals 3d6 +1/level (max +25) damage instead.

rows.name: Fire Seeds
rows.target: Up to four touched acorns or up to eight touched holly berries
rows.saving_throw: None or Reflex half; see text
rows.short_description: Acorn grenades: thrown splash weapons for total 1d6/level (max 20d6) fire divided among up to 4; Holly berries: command-detonated 1d8+1/level (5-ft. burst) within 200 ft.

rows.name: Fire Shield
rows.short_description: Wreath of flames deals 1d6 +1/level (max +15) cold or fire to melee attackers; grants half damage (and Evasion-like) vs. the opposite energy type.

rows.name: Fire Storm
rows.short_description: Sheets of roaring flame deal 1d6/level (max 20d6); can spare natural vegetation/plant creatures you choose.

rows.name: Fire Trap
rows.short_description: Wards a closable item; opening it (by others) triggers 5-ft.-radius explosion for 1d4 +1/level (max +20) fire; attune friends with password; trap DCs = 25 + spell level.

rows.name: Fireball
rows.short_description: Pea-sized bead detonates for 1d6/level (max 10d6) fire; ignites combustibles; can melt soft metals; may detonate early if blocked.

rows.name: Flame Arrow
rows.target: Fifty projectiles in contact at casting
rows.short_description: Ammunition deals +1d6 fire on hit; can ignite flammable objects; doesn’t set struck creatures ablaze.

rows.name: Flame Blade
rows.short_description: Wield a scimitar-like blade of fire; melee touch attacks deal 1d8 +1/2 levels (max +10) fire; ignites combustibles; doesn’t work underwater.

rows.name: Flame Strike
rows.short_description: Column of divine fire deals 1d6/level (max 15d6); half is fire, half divine (not reduced by fire resistance).

rows.name: Flaming Sphere
rows.short_description: Rolling 5-ft. sphere moves 30 ft./round and deals 2d6 fire to a creature it enters (Ref negates); ignites combustibles; needs your move action to direct.

rows.name: Flare
rows.short_description: Burst of light dazzles one creature for 1 minute.

rows.name: Flesh to Stone
rows.short_description: Turns a living creature (and its gear) to inert stone; damage to statue persists if later restored.

rows.name: Fly
rows.short_description: Subject flies 60 ft. (good) or 40 ft. in medium/heavy armor; descends safely for 1d6 rounds when duration ends.

rows.name: Fog Cloud
rows.short_description: Obscures vision beyond 5 ft.; within 5 ft. creatures have concealment; dispersed by moderate/strong wind; doesn’t function underwater.

rows.name: Forbiddance
rows.short_description: Seals area against planar travel; damages entrants of different alignment (6d6 or 12d6, Will half); can include a password; overlapping effects don’t stack.

rows.name: Forcecage
rows.area: Barred cage (20-ft. cube) or windowless cell (10-ft. cube)
rows.short_description: Invisible cage/walls of force imprison creatures; blocks ethereal travel; can be disintegrated; barred version allows spells/breath weapons through gaps.

rows.name: Foresight
rows.short_description: You’re never surprised or flat-footed; gain warnings of danger and +2 insight bonus to AC and Reflex (not granted to a different target).

rows.name: Fox's Cunning
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Intelligence; increases save DCs of Int-based spells cast during duration (no bonus spells or skill points).

rows.name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As fox’s cunning, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Freedom
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) or see text
rows.short_description: Frees subject from restraints and effects like paralysis, petrification, slow, web, maze, imprisonment (the last two require casting at the exact spot and knowing the victim).

rows.name: Freedom of Movement
rows.short_description: Move and attack normally in magical impediments; auto-succeed to resist or escape grapples/pins; allows normal movement/attacks underwater.

rows.name: Gaseous Form
rows.short_description: Subject becomes misty and insubstantial; DR 10/magic; immune to poison and crits; fly 10 ft. (perfect); pass through cracks; can’t attack or cast normal spells.

rows.name: Gate
rows.duration: Instantaneous or concentration (up to 1 round/level); see text
rows.short_description: Creates a planar portal for precise interplanar travel (concentration to hold open); or calls extraplanar creatures (1,000 XP), with control limits by HD; deities/uniques choose whether to come.

rows.name: Geas/Quest
rows.short_description: As lesser geas but any HD and no save; subject takes 3d6 damage/day and must save or be sickened if not pursuing the task; remove curse ends only if cast 2 levels higher; limited wish/miracle/wish end it.

rows.name: Geas, Lesser
rows.target: One living creature with 7 HD or less
rows.short_description: Compels service or forbearance; if prevented for 24h, subject accrues −2 to all ability scores/day (to −8) until resuming; break enchantment/limited wish/remove curse/miracle/wish end it.

rows.name: Gentle Repose
rows.short_description: Preserves a corpse, pausing decay and extending the time limit for raise dead; also works on severed parts.

rows.name: Ghost Sound
rows.short_description: Creates illusory sounds up to the volume of 4 creatures/level; pairs well with silent image; can be made permanent.

rows.name: Ghoul Touch
rows.short_description: Melee touch paralyzes a humanoid; paralyzed target exudes a stench that sickens nearby living creatures (Fort negates; poison immunity applies).

rows.name: Giant Vermin
rows.target: Up to three vermin, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Enlarges specified vermin to size by caster level; obey simple commands; stats as in Monster Manual.

rows.name: Glibness
rows.short_description: +30 on Bluff to convince; lie-detection or truth-compulsion requires CL check vs. DC 15 + your CL to work.

rows.name: Glitterdust
rows.short_description: Golden dust blinds targets (Will negates) and outlines invisible creatures/objects; −40 on Hide.

rows.name: Globe of Invulnerability
rows.short_description: As lesser globe of invulnerability, but also excludes 4th-level spells and lower.

rows.name: Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser
rows.short_description: Immobile sphere excludes 3rd-level or lower spells/spell-like effects; higher-level spells pass; targeted dispel can bring it down.

rows.name: Glyph of Warding
rows.target: Object touched or up to 5 sq. ft./level
rows.short_description: Password/condition-triggered ward that either blasts (1d8/2 levels, max 5d8) or releases a stored harmful spell (≤3rd).

rows.name: Glyph of Warding, Greater
rows.short_description: As glyph of warding, but blast deals up to 10d8 and it can store a spell of 6th level or lower.

rows.name: Goodberry
rows.short_description: Enchants 2d4 berries; each provides a meal’s nourishment and heals 1 hp (max 8 hp/24 hours per creature).

rows.name: Good Hope
rows.target: One living creature/level, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: +2 morale bonus on attacks, damage, saves, ability checks, and skill checks; counters/dispels crushing despair.

rows.name: Grease
rows.short_description: Makes surface or item slippery: creatures fall (Ref negates) or drop greased item; grants +10 to Escape Artist and to resist/escape grapples if worn.

rows.name: Guards and Wards
rows.range: Anywhere within the area to be warded
rows.area: Up to 200 sq. ft./level (S), up to 20 ft. high; shaped as desired
rows.short_description: Wards a stronghold with fog, arcane locks, regenerating webs, confusion at intersections, lost doors, plus one extra effect (lights, magic mouths, stinking clouds, gust, or suggestion).

rows.name: Guidance
rows.short_description: +1 competence bonus on one attack roll, save, or skill check (choose before the roll).

rows.name: Gust of Wind
rows.short_description: 50-mph line of wind knocks down/rolls Tiny or smaller, impedes Small/Medium, penalizes ranged attacks and Listen, extinguishes flames, and blows vapors.

rows.name: Hallow
rows.area: 40-ft. radius emanating from the touched point
rows.short_description: Makes site holy: magic circle vs. evil; +4 sacred to turning, −4 to commanding; bodies interred can’t become undead; can fix one spell effect for 1 year.

rows.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
rows.short_description: Makes natural terrain look/sound/smell like other natural terrain; doesn’t hide or change creatures/structures.

rows.name: Halt Undead
rows.target: Up to three undead creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Immobilizes up to three undead; nonintelligent get no save; effect ends if they are attacked or take damage.

rows.name: Harm
rows.short_description: Deals 10 hp/level (max 150); on a successful save deals half but not below 1 hp; acts like heal on undead.

rows.name: Haste
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Extra attack on full attack, +1 to attacks, AC (dodge), and Reflex, +30 ft. to all movement modes (to max twice normal); counters/dispels slow.

rows.name: Heal
rows.short_description: Ends many conditions and cures 10 hp/level (max 150); harms undead as harm.

rows.name: Heal, Mass
rows.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As heal, but multiple targets; each heals up to 250 hp.

rows.name: Heal Mount
rows.short_description: As heal, but only affects your special mount.

rows.name: Heat Metal
rows.target: Metal equipment of one creature per two levels (no two more than 30 ft. apart); or 25 lb. of metal/level within a 30-ft. circle
rows.short_description: Heats metal to deal staged fire damage; cold damage offsets point-for-point; half damage and steams underwater; counters/dispels chill metal.

rows.name: Helping Hand
rows.short_description: Invisible to all but you and the subject, a ghostly hand finds a described creature within 5 miles and beckons it back along a direct route.

rows.name: Heroes’ Feast
rows.short_description: Conjures feast for up to one creature/level; after 1 hour of eating, cures disease/nausea, grants poison immunity (12h), temp hp (1d8+1/2 levels, max +10), +1 morale to attacks/Will and fear immunity (12h).

rows.name: Heroism
rows.short_description: Target gains +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, saves, and skill checks.

rows.name: Heroism, Greater
rows.short_description: As heroism, but +4 morale bonus, immunity to fear, and temporary hp equal to caster level (max 20).

rows.name: Hide from Animals
rows.short_description: Animals can’t perceive warded creatures by any senses; ends if a recipient attacks or touches an animal.

rows.name: Hide from Undead
rows.short_description: Undead can’t perceive warded creatures; intelligent undead get one Will save; ends if recipients turn/command undead, touch undead, or attack any creature.

rows.name: Hold Animal
rows.short_description: As hold person, but affects an animal.

rows.name: Hold Monster
rows.short_description: As hold person, but affects any living creature.

rows.name: Hold Monster, Mass
rows.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As hold person, but multiple targets and any living creature.

rows.name: Hold Person
rows.short_description: Humanoid is paralyzed but aware; new save each round as a full-round action; flying/swimming creatures fall or may drown.

rows.name: Hold Person, Mass
rows.target: One or more humanoid creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As hold person, but multiple humanoids.

rows.name: Hold Portal
rows.target: One portal, up to 20 sq. ft./level
rows.short_description: Holds door/gate/window shut as if locked; +5 to break DC; knock or dispel magic negates.

rows.name: Holy Aura
rows.target: One creature/level in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: Wards allies with +4 deflection AC and +4 resistance on saves, SR 25 vs. evil spells, blocks possession/mental control; evil melee attackers must save or be blinded.

rows.name: Holy Smite
rows.short_description: Damages and can blind evil; harms neutrals for half (quarter on save); good creatures unaffected. Evil: 1d8/2 levels (max 5d8) or 1d6/level (max 10d6) to evil outsiders; blind 1 round (Will halves and negates blind).

rows.name: Holy Sword
rows.short_description: Weapon becomes +5 holy and radiates magic circle against evil; re-creates circle each round; ends 1 round after leaving your hand; supersedes weapon’s own properties; not cumulative with similar effects; doesn’t affect artifacts.

rows.name: Holy Word
rows.area: Nongood creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: HD ≤ CL–10: killed; ≤ CL–5: paralyzed, blinded, deafened; ≤ CL–1: blinded, deafened; = CL: deafened. On your home plane, nongood extraplanar creatures are banished (Will –4 negates). HD > CL unaffected.

rows.name: Horrid Wilting
rows.target: Living creatures, no two of which can be more than 60 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Evaporates moisture: living take 1d6/level (max 20d6); water elementals and plants take 1d8/level (max 20d8).

rows.name: Hypnotic Pattern
rows.short_description: Fascinates 2d4 + caster level (max 10) HD of creatures, lowest HD first; sightless creatures unaffected.

rows.name: Hypnotism
rows.area: Several living creatures, no two of which may be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Fascinates 2d4 HD; +2 save in combat, –2 if single noncombat target; target shifts attitude 2 steps for one brief reasonable request; forgets being enspelled.

rows.name: Ice Storm
rows.short_description: Hail deals 3d6 bludgeoning + 2d6 cold; –4 to Listen checks; land speed halved in area; no lasting terrain effects.

rows.name: Identify
rows.short_description: Reveals all magic properties, activation, and charges; does not work on artifacts; requires pearl (≥100 gp) infusion.

rows.name: Illusory Script
rows.target: One touched object weighing no more than 10 lb.
rows.short_description: Only designated readers can understand; others trigger a 30-minute suggestion (on failed save). Dispel removes; true seeing + read magic/comprehend languages reveals.

rows.name: Illusory Wall
rows.effect: Image 1 ft. by 10 ft. by 10 ft.
rows.short_description: Creates convincing illusory wall/ceiling/floor; tactile search reveals but does not dispel; nonvisual detection works normally.

rows.name: Imbue with Spell Ability
rows.short_description: Grants prepared cleric spells (abjuration/divination/healing only) to a creature with Int ≥5, Wis ≥9; HD limits: ≤2: one 1st; 3–4: one or two 1st; ≥5: up to two 1st and one 2nd. Uses your caster level for variables.

rows.name: Implosion
rows.short_description: Each round you concentrate, one corporeal target collapses and dies (one attempt per creature). No effect on gaseous or incorporeal creatures.

rows.name: Imprisonment
rows.short_description: Entombs target in stasis deep underground until freed by freedom cast at the site; discern location reveals; wish/miracle reveal location only; –4 on save if you know name and facts.

rows.name: Incendiary Cloud
rows.area: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
rows.short_description: Obscuring smoke with white-hot embers deals 4d6 fire each round on your turn (Ref half each round); drifts 10 ft./round away like cloudkill or up to 60 ft. by concentration; wind disperses; not underwater.

rows.name: Inflict Critical Wounds
rows.short_description: As inflict light wounds, but 4d8 +1/level (max +20) damage; heals undead instead.

rows.name: Inflict Critical Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As mass inflict light wounds, but 4d8 +1/level (max +40) negative energy to living; heals undead.

rows.name: Inflict Light Wounds
rows.short_description: Touch deals 1d8 +1/level (max +5) negative energy to living; heals undead.

rows.name: Inflict Light Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Burst of negative energy deals 1d8 +1/level (max +25) to living; heals undead; can be cast spontaneously by clerics who can spontaneously inflict.

rows.name: Inflict Minor Wounds
rows.short_description: As inflict light wounds, but 1 point of damage (Will negates entirely); heals 1 point to undead.

rows.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds
rows.short_description: As inflict light wounds, but 2d8 +1/level (max +10).

rows.name: Inflict Moderate Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As mass inflict light wounds, but 2d8 +1/level (max +30).

rows.name: Inflict Serious Wounds
rows.short_description: As inflict light wounds, but 3d8 +1/level (max +15).

rows.name: Inflict Serious Wounds, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As mass inflict light wounds, but 3d8 +1/level (max +35).

rows.name: Insanity
rows.short_description: Subject suffers continuous confusion as the spell until cured; remove curse doesn’t help; heal/greater restoration/limited wish/miracle/wish cure it.

rows.name: Insect Plague
rows.effect: One swarm of locusts per three levels, each adjacent to at least one other swarm
rows.short_description: Summons contiguous stationary locust swarms (up to 6 at 18th level) that attack creatures in their areas. See Monster Manual for swarm details.

rows.name: Invisibility
rows.target: You or a creature or object weighing no more than 100 lb./level
rows.saving_throw: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
rows.short_description: Subject and gear become invisible; ends if subject attacks; indirect actions don’t break it; items dropped become visible.

rows.name: Invisibility, Greater
rows.short_description: As invisibility, but does not end when the subject attacks.

rows.name: Invisibility, Mass
rows.target: Any number of creatures, no two of which can be more than 180 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As invisibility, but multiple creatures; broken for any creature that attacks; members can’t see each other; breaks if separation >180 ft.

rows.name: Invisibility Purge
rows.short_description: You radiate a 5-ft./level sphere that negates all forms of invisibility within it.

rows.name: Invisibility Sphere
rows.area: 10-ft.-radius emanation around the creature or object touched
rows.short_description: As invisibility, but confers to all creatures within 10 ft.; allies inside can see each other; those leaving become visible; recipient attacking ends the sphere.

rows.name: Iron Body
rows.short_description: Your body becomes living iron: DR 15/adamantine; many immunities; half acid/fire; +6 Str, –6 Dex, speed halved; ASF 50%, –8 armor check; unarmed as club; sink like a stone; vulnerable to effects vs. iron golems.

rows.name: Ironwood
rows.effect: An ironwood object weighing up to 5 lb./level
rows.short_description: Turns wood into steel-strong, fire-resistant ironwood; affected by wood-shaping magic, not by metal-targeting magic; half output creates +1-equivalent armor/shield/weapon.

rows.name: Jump
rows.short_description: +10 enhancement to Jump checks; +20 at CL 5; +30 at CL 9 (max).

rows.name: Keen Edge
rows.target: One weapon or fifty projectiles (all in contact)
rows.short_description: Doubles threat range of a slashing or piercing weapon; doesn’t stack with Improved Critical; not for natural weapons.

rows.name: Knock
rows.target: One door, box, or chest up to 10 sq. ft./level
rows.short_description: Opens stuck, barred, locked, held, or arcane locked portals; can suspend arcane lock for 10 minutes; each casting opens up to two impediments.

rows.name: Know Direction
rows.short_description: You instantly know which way is north (where applicable); not reliable on some planes.

rows.name: Legend Lore
rows.short_description: Reveals legends about a person, place, or thing; casting time and detail level depend on proximity/knowledge (minutes to weeks).

rows.name: Leomund’s Secret Chest
rows.target: One chest and up to 1 cu. ft. of goods/caster level
rows.short_description: Hides a costly chest on the Ethereal Plane; retrieve at will with miniature replica; after 60 days, 5%/day risk of loss; losing replica strands chest.

rows.name: Leomund’s Secure Shelter
rows.short_description: Conjures a sturdy, alarmed, arcane locked cottage with furnishings and unseen servant; resists mundane missiles and fire like stone.

rows.name: Leomund’s Tiny Hut
rows.short_description: Opaque from outside, transparent within; shelters up to 10 Medium creatures; mitigates temperature and weather; destroyed by hurricane-force wind or greater.

rows.name: Leomund’s Trap
rows.short_description: Makes a small mechanism appear trapped to detection; causes no effect if ‘sprung’; fails if another such trap is active within 50 ft.

rows.name: Lesser (Spell Name)
rows.short_description: ‘Lesser’ spells are listed under the base spell’s name. Chains include confusion, geas, globe of invulnerability, planar ally/binding, and restoration.

rows.name: Levitate
rows.range: Personal or close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
rows.target: You or one willing creature or one object (up to 100 lb./level)
rows.short_description: Move target up or down 20 ft./round (no horizontal movement); attacking incurs cumulative –1 to –5 penalty until stabilized for 1 round.

rows.name: Light
rows.short_description: Touched object shines like a torch (bright 20 ft., dim +20 ft.); counters/dispel darkness of equal or lower level.

rows.name: Lightning Bolt
rows.short_description: Deals 1d6/level electricity (max 10d6); ignites combustibles; can melt soft metals; may punch through barriers if damage destroys them.

rows.name: Limited Wish
rows.short_description: Duplicates lower-level spells (with school limits), undoes many harmful effects, or produces comparable power effects; must pay XP (300+ as applicable) and costly components if duplicated spell has them.

rows.name: Liveoak
rows.short_description: Enchants a Huge oak near a site/thing to guard; on trigger, animates as a treant; if dispelled, takes root where it stands.

rows.name: Locate Creature
rows.short_description: As locate object, but for a familiar or known kind of creature (seen within 30 ft. at least once); shows direction and movement; blocked by running water; fooled by mislead, nondetection, polymorph.

rows.name: Locate Object
rows.area: Circle centered on you, radius 400 ft. + 40 ft./level
rows.short_description: Senses direction of a well-known/clearly visualized object or nearest of a general kind; blocked by thin lead; can’t detect creatures.

rows.name: Longstrider
rows.short_description: Enhancement bonus +10 ft. to your base land speed; no effect on other movement modes.

rows.name: Lullaby
rows.short_description: Creatures become drowsy: –5 to Listen/Spot and –2 on Will saves vs. sleep while it lasts.

rows.name: Mage Armor
rows.short_description: +4 armor bonus made of force; no ACP, ASF, or speed reduction; protects vs. incorporeal as normal armor would not.

rows.name: Mage Hand
rows.target: One nonmagical, unattended object up to 5 lb.
rows.short_description: Telekinetically move a 5-lb. object up to 15 ft. per move action; ends if beyond range.

rows.name: Magic Circle against Chaos
rows.short_description: As magic circle against evil, but aligned vs. chaos (like protection from chaos); can imprison a nonlawful called creature.

rows.name: Magic Circle against Evil
rows.short_description: As protection from evil for all in area and keeps nongood summoned creatures at bay; can be focused inward to bind a nongood called creature; diagram + dimensional anchor improve security.

rows.name: Magic Circle against Good
rows.short_description: As magic circle against evil, but aligned vs. good (like protection from good); can imprison a nonevil called creature.

rows.name: Magic Circle against Law
rows.short_description: As magic circle against evil, but aligned vs. law (like protection from law); can imprison a nonchaotic called creature.

rows.name: Magic Fang
rows.short_description: One natural weapon gains +1 enhancement on attack and damage; can be made permanent with permanency.

rows.name: Magic Fang, Greater
rows.short_description: Natural weapon enhancement +1 per 4 levels (max +5) or all natural weapons +1; can be made permanent with permanency.

rows.name: Magic Jar
rows.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body
rows.short_description: Your soul enters a gem; you possess bodies (Will negates; blocked by protection from evil, etc.); host keeps physical scores; you keep mental stats and class features; various end conditions.

rows.name: Magic Missile
rows.target: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart
rows.short_description: 1–5 unerring force missiles deal 1d4+1 each (additional missiles at CL 3,5,7,9); designate targets before SR/damage; doesn’t harm objects.

rows.name: Magic Mouth
rows.short_description: Object/creature speaks a ≤25-word message on specified audible/visual trigger (range 15 ft./level); can’t activate magic; can be made permanent via permanency.

rows.name: Magic Stone
rows.short_description: Up to 3 pebbles become +1 projectiles: 1d6+1 damage (2d6+2 vs. undead); range increment 20 ft. thrown or 50 ft. slung.

rows.name: Magic Vestment
rows.short_description: Grants +1 enhancement per 4 levels (max +5) to armor/shield; clothing counts as armor with +0 base AC for this spell.

rows.name: Magic Weapon
rows.short_description: Weapon gains +1 enhancement on attack and damage (stacks not with masterwork’s attack bonus); can affect a monk’s unarmed strike.

rows.name: Magic Weapon, Greater
rows.target: One weapon or fifty projectiles (all in contact)
rows.short_description: As magic weapon, but +1 enhancement per 4 caster levels (max +5); up to 50 projectiles of one kind; projectiles lose the transmutation when used. Material: powdered lime and carbon.

rows.name: Major Creation
rows.short_description: As minor creation, plus mineral objects (stone/crystal/base metals). Duration by material: vegetable 2 hr/level; stone/crystal/base metal 1 hr/level; precious metal 20 min/level; gems 10 min/level; rare metals 1 round/level; cannot create cold iron.

rows.name: Major Image
rows.effect: Visual, audible, olfactory, and thermal figment (see text)
rows.short_description: As silent image but includes sound, smell, and heat; you can move the image while concentrating; disappears when struck unless you make it react appropriately. Material: fleece.

rows.name: Make Whole
rows.target: One object of up to 10 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: As mending but fully repairs a damaged object of any substance (multiple breaks OK). Does not restore magic, mend rods/staffs/wands, or fix warped/burned/disintegrated/powdered/melted/vaporized items; no effect on creatures (incl. constructs).

rows.name: Mark of Justice
rows.short_description: Inscribes a visible mark and a condition; when triggered, functions as bestow curse. Can be cast only on willing or restrained subject. Removed by break enchantment, limited wish, miracle, remove curse (CL ≥ yours), or wish.

rows.name: Mass (Spell Name)
rows.short_description: “Mass” spells are listed under the base spell (e.g., mass cure/inflict, mass ability buffs, mass invisibility, etc.).

rows.name: Maze
rows.short_description: Banishes target to an extradimensional labyrinth of force. Each round, target can attempt DC 20 Int check to escape (full-round action). Ends after 10 minutes if not escaped. Teleport/dimension door don’t help; plane shift can exit; minotaurs immune.

rows.name: Meld into Stone
rows.short_description: You and gear merge into stone; remain aware of time, can cast spells on yourself; expelled and damaged by certain spells (stone to flesh 5d6 + expel; stone shape 3d6; rock to mud expel then death unless Fort 18; passwall expel). Destruction of stone can slay you.

rows.name: Melf’s Acid Arrow
rows.short_description: Ranged touch; 2d4 acid damage on hit; continues for extra rounds (2d4 each) per 3 caster levels (max 18th). Material: powdered rhubarb leaf & adder’s stomach. Focus: a dart.

rows.name: Mending
rows.target: One object of up to 1 lb.
rows.short_description: Repairs small breaks/tears; welds a single break in metal items; multiple breaks in ceramics/wood OK; repairs holes in leather, etc. Can repair magic items’ bodies (but not powers); cannot repair rods/staffs/wands; no effect on creatures (incl. constructs).

rows.name: Message
rows.short_description: Whispered communications to designated creatures and whispered replies; blocked by silence, 1 ft. stone, 1 in. common metal (or thin lead), or 3 ft. wood/dirt; transmits sound, not meaning. Focus: short copper wire.

rows.name: Meteor Swarm
rows.saving_throw: None or Reflex half; see text
rows.short_description: Create four flaming spheres. Direct hit: ranged touch for 2d6 bludgeoning and no save vs that sphere’s fire. Each sphere explodes in 40-ft. radius for 6d6 fire (Ref half). Overlaps require separate saves; fire resistance applies per sphere.

rows.name: Mind Blank
rows.short_description: Immunity to mind-affecting effects and information-gathering by divinations; foils limited wish/miracle/wish used to affect mind or learn about the subject; area scrying works but subject isn’t detected; targeted scrying fails.

rows.name: Mind Fog
rows.area: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
rows.short_description: Stationary thin mist imposes –10 competence penalty on Wisdom checks and Will saves while in fog and for 2d6 rounds after leaving; dispersed by wind (moderate 4 rounds; strong 1 round).

rows.name: Minor Creation
rows.effect: Unattended, nonmagical object of nonliving plant matter, up to 1 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: Create nonliving vegetable-matter items (e.g., rope, ladder). Skill check required for complex items. Created items can’t serve as material components. Material: a tiny bit of the same substance.

rows.name: Minor Image
rows.effect: Visual figment with minor sounds (no intelligible speech)
rows.short_description: As silent image, but includes minor sounds (not understandable speech). Material: fleece.

rows.name: Miracle
rows.short_description: Petition your deity for effects: duplicate cleric spells ≤8th (incl. domain), other spells ≤7th, undo certain effects, or similar power (no XP cost). Greater requests possible for 5,000 XP; out-of-ethos requests refused. Duplicated spells use 9th-level DCs and require normal costly components/XP.

rows.name: Mirage Arcana
rows.short_description: As hallucinatory terrain but can make an area (including structures) appear as something else; includes audible, visual, tactile, and olfactory elements; cannot add, conceal, or disguise creatures.

rows.name: Mirror Image
rows.short_description: Creates 1d4 +1/3 levels (max 8) images that mimic you; attacks randomly target images/you; a hit destroys an image (AC 10 + size + Dex). Images react to area effects. Doesn’t work vs. blinded/eyes-closed foes.

rows.name: Misdirection
rows.target: One creature or object, up to a 10-ft. cube
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Divinations that reveal auras (detect evil/magic, discern lies, etc.) perceive the target as another chosen object unless the diviner succeeds on a Will save. No save for target or decoy object.

rows.name: Mislead
rows.duration: 1 round/level (D) and concentration + 3 rounds; see text
rows.saving_throw: None or Will disbelief (if interacted with)
rows.short_description: You become invisible (as greater invisibility) while an illusory double (as major image) appears and acts under your concentration; lasts for script duration after you stop concentrating.

rows.name: Modify Memory
rows.short_description: Alter up to 5 minutes of the subject’s memories: erase, perfect recall, change, or implant an event. After failed save, you spend up to 5 minutes visualizing. Illogical memories may be dismissed. Doesn’t negate charm/geas/suggestion, etc.

rows.name: Moment of Prescience
rows.short_description: Once during duration, gain insight bonus equal to caster level (max +25) on one attack roll, opposed check, save, or to AC against a single attack; must activate before the roll/attack; immediate activation allowed.

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Disjunction
rows.area: All magical effects and magic items within a 40-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Ends spells/effects like dispel; magic items must save or become mundane; 1%/level chance to destroy antimagic field; 1%/level to affect artifacts (risk: fail DC 25 Will or lose spellcasting forever); likely attracts powerful attention.

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Faithful Hound
rows.duration: 1 hour/level or until barking; then 1 round/level; see text
rows.short_description: Invisible to all but you; barks when Small+ creatures approach within 30 ft.; sees invisible/ethereal; ignores figments but reacts to shadow. At 5 ft., bites each round (+10, 2d6+3, counts as magic). Can’t be attacked; can be dispelled. Ends if you’re >100 ft. away. Material: tiny silver whistle, bone, thread.

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Lucubration
rows.short_description: Recalls one spell of 5th level or lower cast in the last 24 hours. You must supply any material components before using the recalled spell.

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Magnificent Mansion
rows.effect: Extradimensional mansion, up to three 10-ft. cubes/level (S)
rows.short_description: Creates portal to a furnished, staffed extradimensional mansion (food and unseen-servant-like staff). Only designated creatures may enter. Focus: tiny ivory portal, polished marble, and silver spoon (each 5 gp).

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Private Sanctum
rows.short_description: Blocks vision from outside (appears as dark fog); blocks sound from leaving; inside sees out normally; blocks scrying and detect thoughts; allows telepathy/sendings. Can be made permanent. Materials: lead sheet, opaque glass, cotton/cloth wad, powdered chrysolite.

rows.name: Mordenkainen’s Sword
rows.short_description: Floating force sword attacks one target/round on your turn; attack bonus = CL + key ability +3; deals 4d6+3 force, 19–20/×2; strikes incorporeal. Returns if out of range/sight or not directed. Dispel/disintegrate/sphere of annihilation/rod of cancellation affect it. Focus: miniature platinum sword (250 gp).

rows.name: Mount
rows.effect: One light horse or pony (your choice)
rows.short_description: Summons a willing mount with bit, bridle, and riding saddle. Material: bit of horse hair.

rows.name: Move Earth
rows.area: Dirt in an area up to 750 ft. square and up to 10 ft. deep (S)
rows.short_description: Regrades earth (clay/loam/sand) in waves to desired contours; casting time 10 minutes per 150-ft. square (max area 4h10m). No effect on rock formations, too slow to trap, can’t tunnel; no effect on earth creatures. Material: mixed soils and an iron blade.

rows.name: Neutralize Poison
rows.target: Creature or object of up to 1 cu. ft./level touched
rows.short_description: Halts further effects of existing poison and ends temporary effects (but doesn’t reverse instantaneous damage). Grants immunity to poison exposure for the duration; can neutralize poison in a creature/object instead. Material: bit of charcoal.

rows.name: Nightmare
rows.short_description: Send a horrific dream: subject takes 1d10 damage, becomes fatigued, and can’t regain arcane spells for 24 hours. Save modifiers depend on knowledge/connection (picture –2; possession –4; body part –10). Dispel evil during casting stuns you (10 min/CL). Trance option until target sleeps; you are defenseless.

rows.name: Nondetection
rows.short_description: Wards target (and gear) from many divinations (clairaudience/clairvoyance, locate object, detect spells, crystal ball, etc.). Diviner must beat CL check DC 11 + your CL (or 15 + your CL if cast on self/own item). Material: 50 gp diamond dust.

rows.name: Nystul’s Magic Aura
rows.target: One touched object up to 5 lb./level
rows.short_description: Alter or mask an item’s aura (nonmagical, specific magic item, or spell aura). Identify allows a Will save to notice false aura. Doesn’t work on exceptionally powerful auras (e.g., artifacts). Focus: small silk square.

rows.name: Obscure Object
rows.target: One object touched of up to 100 lb./level
rows.short_description: Hides an object from scrying/locating effects (targeted fail; area-based fail to perceive it). Material: chameleon skin.

rows.name: Obscuring Mist
rows.area: Cloud spreads in 20-ft. radius from you, 20 ft. high
rows.short_description: Stationary fog: beyond 5 ft. vision blocked; 5 ft. concealment; farther total concealment. Dispersed by wind (moderate 4 rounds; strong 1 round) or burned away by certain fire effects. Not underwater.

rows.name: Open/Close
rows.target: Object ≤ 30 lb. or portal that can be opened or closed
rows.short_description: Opens or closes lightweight containers/portals; fails if something resists (lock/bar). Focus: brass key.

rows.name: Order’s Wrath
rows.area: Nonlawful creatures within a burst that fills a 30-ft. cube
rows.short_description: Smite chaotic and neutral creatures: chaotic take 1d8/2 levels (max 5d8) or 1d6/level (max 10d6) if chaotic outsiders and are dazed 1 round (Will halves and negates daze). Neutral/non-chaotic take half damage (quarter on Will); not dazed.

rows.name: Otiluke’s Freezing Sphere
rows.short_description: Frigid globe explodes for 1d6 cold/level (max 15d6) or 1d8/level vs. water elementals (max 15d8). Can freeze water to 6" depth over 100 sq. ft./level for 1 round/level (traps swimmers; Str or Escape Artist DC 25). You can hold the charge up to 1 round/level; if it expires, it bursts centered on you. Focus: crystal sphere.

rows.name: Otiluke’s Resilient Sphere
rows.short_description: Immobile globe of force traps subject; nothing passes through; only rod of cancellation/negation, disintegrate, or targeted dispel destroys sphere (subject unharmed). Material: matched crystal hemisphere and gum arabic hemisphere.

rows.name: Otiluke’s Telekinetic Sphere
rows.effect: 1-ft.-diameter/level sphere, centered around creatures or objects
rows.short_description: As resilient sphere, plus contents weigh 1/16 normal; you can telekinetically move the sphere (contents ≤5,000 lb.) up to 30 ft./round with concentration; falls at 60 ft./round; you can move it even if inside. Material: crystal hemisphere, gum arabic hemisphere, pair of small bar magnets.

rows.name: Otto’s Irresistible Dance
rows.short_description: Target can do nothing but caper; –4 AC, –10 Reflex, loses shield bonus; provokes attacks of opportunity each round on its turn.

rows.name: Overland Flight
rows.short_description: As fly but speed 40 ft. (30 ft. in medium/heavy armor or load), average maneuverability; can hustle without nonlethal damage for long-distance travel (≈64 miles/8 hours at 40 ft.).

rows.name: Owl’s Wisdom
rows.short_description: +4 enhancement to Wisdom (affects skills and spell DCs for Wis casters; no bonus slots). Material: owl feathers or droppings.

rows.name: Owl’s Wisdom, Mass
rows.target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As owl’s wisdom, but affects multiple creatures.

rows.name: Passwall
rows.short_description: Creates passage through wood, plaster, or stone (not metal or harder). Multiple castings can breach thick walls. When it ends, creatures are ejected toward the nearest exit (or far exit if dispelled/dismissed). Material: pinch of sesame seeds.

rows.name: Pass without Trace
rows.short_description: Subjects leave no tracks or scent; cannot be tracked by nonmagical means.

rows.name: Permanency
rows.short_description: Makes certain spells permanent. Personal options (self-only) and broader options on creatures/objects/areas have minimum caster levels and XP costs (see PHB tables). Effects on others/areas can be dispelled normally; personal uses only by higher-level casters.

rows.name: Permanent Image
rows.area: Figment up to a 20-ft. cube + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
rows.short_description: As silent image but visual/auditory/olfactory/thermal and permanent; you can move it within range while concentrating. Material: fleece plus 100 gp powdered jade.

rows.name: Persistent Image
rows.short_description: As silent image but includes multiple senses and follows a preset script without concentration; can include intelligible speech. Material: fleece and grains of sand.

rows.name: Phantasmal Killer
rows.saving_throw: Will disbelief (if interacted with), then Fortitude partial
rows.short_description: Creates a personal nightmare visible only to the target. If Will disbelief fails, target must make Fort save or die from fear; on success, still takes 3d6 damage. If disbelieved and wearer has helm of telepathy, the beast can be turned on you unless you disbelieve.

rows.name: Phantom Steed
rows.short_description: Conjures Large mount (AC 18, hp 7 +1/level; speed 20 ft./level, max 240 ft.; carries rider +10 lb./level). Special abilities by caster level: 8th—ignore soft ground; 10th—water walk; 12th—short air walk bursts; 14th—fly (average).

rows.name: Phase Door
rows.effect: Ethereal 5 ft. by 8 ft. opening, 10 ft. deep + 5 ft./3 levels
rows.short_description: Invisible ethereal passage through wood/plaster/stone usable only by you (or by others if set with a trigger); you may bring one Medium-or-smaller creature (costs 2 uses). True seeing reveals but does not allow use. Dispel ejects occupants. Can be made permanent.

rows.name: Planar Ally
rows.effect: One or two called elementals/outsiders totaling ≤12 HD, within 30 ft. of each other
rows.short_description: As lesser planar ally but up to 12 HD (one or two of same kind). You bargain and pay for services per HD/time/risk; creatures depart when task ends. XP Cost 250.

rows.name: Planar Ally, Greater
rows.effect: Up to three called elementals/outsiders totaling ≤18 HD, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As lesser planar ally but up to 18 HD (one or up to three of same kind). You bargain and pay together; depart at task’s end. XP Cost 500.

rows.name: Planar Ally, Lesser
rows.effect: One called elemental or outsider of 6 HD or less
rows.short_description: Petition your deity (or ethos) to send a 6 HD or less ally; you must communicate, bargain, and pay (100/500/1000 gp per HD by task length; adjust for risk/ethos). Leaves when task ends. Also gains descriptor of called creature (air/chaotic/etc.). XP Cost 100.

rows.name: Planar Binding
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
rows.targets: Up to three elementals/outsiders totaling ≤12 HD, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As lesser planar binding but up to 12 HD (one or up to three of same kind). Each gets save/SR, separate escape tries, and must be persuaded/bargained individually.

rows.name: Planar Binding, Greater
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
rows.targets: Up to three elementals/outsiders totaling ≤18 HD, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As lesser planar binding but up to 18 HD (one or up to three of same kind). Each creature saves/escapes/persuaded separately.

rows.name: Planar Binding, Lesser
rows.range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see text
rows.target: One elemental or outsider of 6 HD or less
rows.short_description: Calls a known kind (or named) outsider into a prepared inward-focused magic circle trap.
