It can escape by SR vs. CL, dimensional travel, or Cha check (DC 15 + 1/2 CL + your Cha); 1/day each method. Dimensional anchor and calling diagram help. You negotiate a service via opposed Cha checks; natural 1 frees it.

rows.name: Plane Shift
rows.target: Creature touched, or up to eight willing creatures joining hands
rows.short_description: Shifts touched creatures to another plane; arrival 5–500 miles from intended spot. Requires forked rod keyed to destination plane. Does not return you.

rows.name: Plant Growth
rows.short_description: Overgrowth: within long range, thickens natural vegetation (speed 5 ft.; shapes: 100-ft radius, 150-ft semicircle, or 200-ft quarter circle; you can exclude areas). Enrichment: within ½ mile, increases crop yield by one-third for a year. Counters diminish plants; no effect on plant creatures.

rows.name: Poison
rows.short_description: Melee touch inflicts 1d10 Con damage now and 1d10 Con damage 1 minute later (each instance Fort DC 10 + 1/2 CL + Wis negates).

rows.name: Polar Ray
rows.short_description: Ranged touch ray deals 1d6 cold damage/level (max 25d6). Focus: small white ceramic cone or prism.

rows.name: Polymorph
rows.short_description: As alter self but to any living form of same type or listed types (aberration, animal, dragon, fey, giant, humanoid, magical beast, monstrous humanoid, ooze, plant, vermin) with HD ≤ CL (or target HD; max 15). Gains Str/Dex/Con and extraordinary attacks of form; keeps Int/Wis/Cha; no Ex qualities, Su, or SLA. Heals as overnight rest on change; shapechangers can revert. Material: empty cocoon.

rows.name: Polymorph Any Object
rows.target: One creature, or one nonmagical object up to 100 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: As polymorph but affects creatures or objects; duration based on similarity (kingdom/class/size/relatedness/Int). Grants new form’s Int (and Wis/Cha if absent). Can’t make/replicate valuable materials or magic; can duplicate several transmutation effects. Damage to new form can kill. Components: mercury, gum arabic, smoke.

rows.name: Power Word Blind
rows.target: One creature with 200 hp or less
rows.short_description: Blinds one creature: ≤50 hp permanent; 51–100 hp 1d4+1 minutes; 101–200 hp 1d4+1 rounds. ≥201 hp unaffected.

rows.name: Power Word Kill
rows.target: One living creature with 100 hp or less
rows.short_description: Kills one creature with ≤100 hp. ≥101 hp unaffected.

rows.name: Power Word Stun
rows.target: One creature with 150 hp or less
rows.short_description: Stuns one creature based on current hp: ≤50 hp 4d4 rounds; 51–100 hp 2d4 rounds; 101–150 hp 1d4 rounds. ≥151 hp unaffected.

rows.name: Prayer
rows.area: All allies and foes within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: Allies gain +1 luck bonus on attacks, weapon damage, saves, and skill checks; foes take –1 penalty on the same.

rows.name: Prestidigitation
rows.short_description: Performs minor tricks: lift 1 lb., color/clean/soil 1-ft. cube/round, chill/warm/flavor 1 lb., create fragile crude objects. No damage or spell duplication; real changes last 1 hour.

rows.name: Prismatic Sphere
rows.short_description: As prismatic wall but a globe surrounding you; <8 HD creatures looking are blinded 2d4×10 minutes. You may pass freely; blocks projection through it. Same seven color effects/negations as prismatic wall. Can be made permanent.

rows.name: Prismatic Spray
rows.short_description: Seven colored rays; creatures with ≤8 HD are blinded 2d4 rounds; each creature is also struck by a random ray: 1 red 20 fire (Ref half), 2 orange 40 acid (Ref half), 3 yellow 80 electricity (Ref half), 4 green poison (Fort partial to 1d6 Con), 5 blue petrify (Fort negates), 6 indigo insanity (Will negates), 7 violet send to another plane (Will negates), 8 two rays.

rows.name: Prismatic Wall
rows.short_description: Opaque vertical wall of seven layers; <8 HD within 20 ft. are blinded 2d4 rounds if they look at it. Each color has specific effect/negation and must be removed in order. Rod of cancellation or Mordenkainen’s disjunction destroys it; antimagic field does not. SR applies per color. Can be made permanent.

rows.name: Produce Flame
rows.short_description: Melee touch or ranged touch (120 ft.) for 1d6 +1/level fire (max +5); each attack reduces duration by 1 minute. Not underwater.

rows.name: Programmed Image
rows.effect: Figment up to 20-ft. cube + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
rows.short_description: As silent image but multi-sensory and activates on set audible/tactile/visual/olfactory trigger (e.g., password). Includes intelligible speech. Material: fleece & 25 gp jade dust. Focus: crystal prism.

rows.name: Project Image
rows.short_description: Creates quasi-real double that mimics you; you can see/hear through it (your body is blinded/deafened while doing so). Your touch-or-greater range spells can originate from the image (not on itself except illusions). Requires line of effect; teleportation ends the spell. Material: small replica of you (5 gp).

rows.name: Protection from Arrows
rows.short_description: DR 10/magic vs. ranged weapon damage (prevents up to 10 points/level; max 100). Focus: piece of tortoise/turtle shell.

rows.name: Protection from Chaos
rows.short_description: As protection from evil, but bonuses and blocking apply vs. chaotic creatures/summons.

rows.name: Protection from Energy
rows.short_description: Choose energy type (acid/cold/electricity/fire/sonic); grants immunity until it absorbs 12/level damage (max 120). Overlaps (doesn’t stack with) resist energy.

rows.name: Protection from Evil
rows.short_description: +2 deflection AC and +2 resistance on saves vs. evil; blocks possession and ongoing mental control; keeps out bodily contact by evil summoned creatures (ends if you attack them). Material: powdered silver circle.

rows.name: Protection from Good
rows.short_description: As protection from evil, but vs. good creatures/summons.

rows.name: Protection from Law
rows.short_description: As protection from evil, but vs. lawful creatures/summons.

rows.name: Protection from Spells
rows.targets: Up to one creature touched per four levels
rows.short_description: Subjects gain +8 resistance bonus on saves vs. spells and spell-like abilities. Material: diamond ≥500 gp crushed and sprinkled. Focus: one 1,000 gp diamond carried by each subject (lose gem = effect ends for that subject).

rows.name: Prying Eyes
rows.short_description: Creates many Fine, flying eyes (Spot = CL, max +15) that scout per a ≤25-word command and return to replay what they saw (1 round per hour). Eyes have normal vision 120 ft., Hide +16, speed 30 ft. (perfect). Dispel destroys. Material: crystal marbles.

rows.name: Prying Eyes, Greater
rows.short_description: As prying eyes, but each eye has true seeing 120 ft. and up to +25 Spot.

rows.name: Purify Food and Drink
rows.target: 1 cu. ft./level of contaminated food and water
rows.short_description: Makes spoiled/poisoned/contaminated food & water pure; spoils unholy water; no effect on creatures or potions.

rows.name: Pyrotechnics
rows.target: One fire source up to a 20-ft. cube
rows.duration: Fireworks 1d4+1 rounds; Smoke cloud 1 round/level + 1d4+1 rounds after leaving
rows.short_description: Transforms a fire into: Fireworks—flash blinds within 120 ft. (Will negates; SR applies) or Smoke—20-ft.-radius choking cloud; sight blocked, –4 Str/Dex (Fort negates; persists briefly after). Consumes/extinguishes mundane fire (large fires partly); damages fire creatures 1/level if used as source; not extinguish magical fire.

rows.name: Quench
rows.area: One 20-ft. cube/level (S) or one fire-based magic item
rows.short_description: Extinguishes all nonmagical fires in area; attempts to dispel fire spells (CL check vs. DC 11 + spell’s CL); deals 1d6/level damage (max 15d6) to fire elementals (no save). Or suppresses fire powers of a single magic item for 1d4 hours (Will negates; artifacts immune).

rows.name: Rage
rows.targets: One willing living creature/3 levels, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Targets gain +2 morale to Str & Con, +1 morale on Will saves, –2 AC; as barbarian rage but no fatigue afterward.

rows.name: Rainbow Pattern
rows.short_description: Fascinates up to 24 HD (closest/lowest HD first); you can move pattern 30 ft./round and fascinated creatures follow (get second save if led into danger; blocked view ends effect). Material: phosphor. Focus: crystal prism.

rows.name: Raise Dead
rows.short_description: Brings a creature back if dead ≤1 day/level and soul is willing. Subject loses one level (or 2 Con if 1st level), returns with hp = HD, cures normal disease/poison, but not magical diseases/curses; body must be whole. Doesn’t work on death effects, undead, constructs, elementals, outsiders, or old age. Material: diamonds ≥5,000 gp.

rows.name: Rary’s Mnemonic Enhancer
rows.short_description: Choose: Prepare up to 3 levels worth of extra spells, or retain a spell of 3rd or lower cast within 1 round before starting this spell. Unused extra spells fade after 24 hours. Material: string and ink of squid secretion mixed with black dragon’s blood. Focus: ivory plaque (≥50 gp).

rows.name: Rary’s Telepathic Bond
rows.targets: You + one willing creature/3 levels, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Telepathic link among willing creatures (Int 3+), regardless of language, across any distance on same plane. Can exclude yourself at casting. Can be made permanent (permanency bonds only two creatures per casting). Material: two different creatures’ eggshell pieces.

rows.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
rows.short_description: Ranged touch; target takes –(1d6 +1/2 levels, max –1d6–5) Strength (to a minimum Str 1).

rows.name: Ray of Exhaustion
rows.short_description: Ranged touch; target becomes exhausted for duration (Fort: fatigued instead). Fatigued target becomes exhausted; no effect on already exhausted. Ends when duration ends. Material: drop of sweat.

rows.name: Ray of Frost
rows.short_description: Ranged touch ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

rows.name: Read Magic
rows.short_description: Deciphers magical writing (rate 1 page/min). Allows Spellcraft to identify glyphs/symbols (DCs: glyph 13, greater glyph 16, symbols 10 + spell level). Can be made permanent. Focus: clear crystal/mineral prism.

rows.name: Reduce Animal
rows.target: One willing animal of Small, Medium, Large, or Huge size
rows.short_description: As reduce person but for one willing animal. Natural attack damage scales down per size.

rows.name: Reduce Person
rows.short_description: Halves dimensions/1⁄8 weight; size category –1 (e.g., Medium→Small): +2 Dex, –2 Str (min 1), +1 attack & AC; space/reach adjust; equipment resizes while carried. Thrown weapons deal normal; projectiles use weapon’s size. Doesn’t stack with other size reductions. Counters/dispels enlarge person. Can be made permanent. Material: powdered iron.

rows.name: Reduce Person, Mass
rows.target: One humanoid creature/level, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As reduce person, but multiple targets.

rows.name: Refuge
rows.short_description: Invests an item with power to teleport its breaker (and worn/carried gear ≤ heavy load) to your abode, or (at your option) teleports you to the item’s possessor when it’s used. Material: specially prepared object with gems worth 1,500 gp.

rows.name: Regenerate
rows.short_description: Restores severed members, broken bones, ruined organs (1 round if parts present & touching; otherwise 2d10 rounds); also heals 4d8+1/level (max +35), removes exhaustion/fatigue, and all nonlethal damage. No effect on nonliving/undead.

rows.name: Reincarnate
rows.short_description: Returns a dead creature (≤1 week; soul willing) in a new young adult body built from elements; retains classes/feats/skills/HD/HP/BAB/saves; adjust Str/Dex/Con by new race and lose old racial mods; –1 level (or –2 Con if 1st level). Gains new form’s natural modes/Ex abilities; may not speak its language. Material: rare oils/unguents worth ≥1,000 gp.

rows.name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
rows.short_description: Cures blindness or deafness (normal or magical); repairs damaged organs but does not restore missing ones. Counters/dispel blindness/deafness.

rows.name: Remove Curse
rows.short_description: Removes all curses on creature or object; usually lets you discard a cursed item. Some curses require higher caster level or special means. Counters/dispel bestow curse.

rows.name: Remove Disease
rows.short_description: Cures diseases and kills parasites (e.g., green slime). Special diseases may need higher caster level. Does not prevent reinfection.

rows.name: Remove Fear
rows.targets: One creature + one additional/4 levels, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Grants +4 morale bonus on saves vs. fear for 10 min.; suppresses ongoing fear effects for the duration. Counters/dispels cause fear.

rows.name: Remove Paralysis
rows.targets: Up to four creatures, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Negates paralysis on one creature; or grants new save with +4 (two targets) or +2 (three/four) vs. the effect. Doesn’t restore ability damage/drain.

rows.name: Repel Metal or Stone
rows.short_description: Waves of force push metal/stone objects away 40 ft./round along set path; small fixed objects bend/break; loose >500 lb. or fixed >3 in. dia not affected. Metal gear drags bearers; antimagic blocks effects on items.

rows.name: Repel Vermin
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Invisible barrier vs. vermin: those with HD < 1/3 your level cannot enter; others need Will save to cross, taking 2d6 damage on crossing and find pressing painful.

rows.name: Repel Wood
rows.short_description: Pushes wooden objects away along a set line (40 ft./round). Fixed wood >3 in. dia. unaffected; smaller fixed wood splinters. Dragging items pull bearers unless dropped; set spears splinter; antimagic blocks. Path persists for duration.

rows.name: Repulsion
rows.area: Up to 10-ft.-radius/level emanation centered on you
rows.short_description: Mobile field prevents creatures from approaching you on a failed save; they can still act otherwise and attack at range.

rows.name: Resistance
rows.short_description: +1 resistance bonus on saves; can be made permanent via permanency. Material: miniature cloak.

rows.name: Resist Energy
rows.short_description: Choose acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic; grants energy resistance 10 (20 at 7th, 30 at 11th). Protects gear; overlaps (does not stack with) protection from energy.

rows.name: Restoration
rows.short_description: As lesser restoration, plus dispels negative levels and restores 1 drained level if lost ≤ 1 day/level; cures all temp ability damage; restores all points drained from one ability; removes fatigue/exhaustion. Material: 100 gp diamond dust.

rows.name: Restoration, Greater
rows.short_description: Dispels all negative levels; reverses level drain to the highest previously attained level if lost ≤ 1 week/level; removes magical ability penalties, all temp ability damage, and all permanent ability drain; removes fatigue/exhaustion and confusion/insanity effects. XP Cost 500.

rows.name: Restoration, Lesser
rows.short_description: Dispels magical effects reducing one ability score or heals 1d4 temporary ability damage to one ability; removes fatigue and improves exhausted to fatigued; doesn’t restore permanent ability drain.

rows.name: Resurrection
rows.short_description: As raise dead but restores full hp and prepared spells; requires any part of body; dead ≤ 10 years/level; subject loses one level (or –2 Con if 1st); can reverse death effects and destroyed undead; not old age; not constructs, elementals, outsiders, or undead. Material: holy water and diamonds ≥10,000 gp.

rows.name: Reverse Gravity
rows.area: Up to one 10-ft. cube per two levels (S)
rows.short_description: Area’s gravity reverses; creatures/objects fall upward (to ceiling or hover at top). Onset allows Reflex to grab something. At end, they fall down. Material: lodestone and iron filings.

rows.name: Righteous Might
rows.short_description: You grow one size category: +4 Str, +2 Con, +2 enhancement to natural armor; DR 3/evil (or 3/good) improving to 6 at 12th level and 9 at 15th; reach/space adjust; gear enlarges; thrown weapons deal normal damage; multiple size increases don’t stack.

rows.name: Rope Trick
rows.target: One touched piece of rope 5 ft. to 30 ft. long
rows.short_description: Rope rises to an extradimensional space for up to 8 creatures; rope can be pulled up; window is invisible; no spells/areas cross the interface; hazardous to nest extradimensional spaces. Material: powdered corn extract and twisted parchment loop.

rows.name: Rusting Grasp
rows.target: One nonmagical ferrous object (or 3-ft.-radius portion) or one ferrous creature
rows.short_description: Touch rusts/destroys iron/steel items (magic metal immune). Against armor: destroys 1d6 points of AC per hit; against metal weapons: touch attack destroys; against ferrous creatures: 3d6+1/level (max +15) damage per successful touch; lasts 1 round/level (one touch/round).

rows.name: Sanctuary
rows.short_description: Creatures must Will save to attack target; on failure they cannot directly attack it. Subject can’t attack without breaking the spell; area effects still affect it.

rows.name: Scare
rows.targets: One living creature/3 levels, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As cause fear but targets creatures of <6 HD: frightened on failed save. Material: bone from certain undead.

rows.name: Scintillating Pattern
rows.short_description: Affects creatures by HD: 6– stunned/confused after unconscious; 7–12 stunned then confused; 13+ confused; sightless unaffected. Material: crystal prism.

rows.name: Scorching Ray
rows.short_description: Fire 1 ray (plus 1/4 levels beyond 3rd, max 3 at 11th). Each ranged touch ray deals 4d6 fire; targets within 30 ft. of each other; all fired simultaneously.

rows.name: Screen
rows.saving_throw: None or Will disbelief (if interacted with); see text
rows.short_description: Creates custom illusion and blocks scrying/direct observation in area; observers see/hear only what you dictate; direct observation may allow disbelief when suspicious.

rows.name: Scrying
rows.short_description: See/hear a subject at any distance; save DC modified by familiarity and connection; sensor carries your vision and has % chance/level to allow certain detect spells and message. Focus varies by class (mirror, font, or pool).

rows.name: Scrying, Greater
rows.short_description: As scrying but faster casting and longer duration; detect alignment, detect magic, message, read magic, and tongues function reliably through the sensor.

rows.name: Sculpt Sound
rows.targets: One creature or object/level, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Create, deaden, or transform sounds for multiple targets in the same way; can’t produce unfamiliar words; drastic voice change prevents casting spells with verbal components.

rows.name: Searing Light
rows.short_description: Ranged touch ray: living 1d8/2 levels (max 5d8); undead 1d6/level (max 10d6), or 1d8/level (max 10d8) if light-vulnerable; constructs/objects 1d6/2 levels (max 5d6).

rows.name: Secret Page
rows.target: Page touched, up to 3 sq. ft.
rows.short_description: Alters contents of a page into something else; special word reveals/hides original; interacts with explosive runes/sepia snake sigil; detect magic shows dim aura; true seeing only reveals hidden material with comprehend languages. Material: powdered herring scales and will-o’-wisp essence.

rows.name: See Invisibility
rows.short_description: You see invisible and ethereal beings/objects as translucent; doesn’t reveal illusions, hidden, or through opaque barriers. Can be made permanent. Material: talc and powdered silver.

rows.name: Seeming
rows.targets: One creature/2 levels, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.saving_throw: Will negates or Will disbelief (if interacted with)
rows.short_description: As disguise self for multiple creatures; unwilling targets get Will save/SR; slain creatures revert.

rows.name: Sending
rows.short_description: Send a 25-word message to a familiar creature; it can reply likewise. 5% failure if on another plane. Material: short piece of fine copper wire.

rows.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
rows.target: One touched book or written work
rows.duration: Permanent or until discharged; see text
rows.short_description: Hidden sigil traps a deliberate reader in amber field of force (immobile, suspended) for 1d4 days +1/day per level or until released; detect magic shows only that text is magical. Material: 500 gp powdered amber, a snake scale, and mushroom spores.

rows.name: Sequester
rows.target: One willing creature or object (up to a 2-ft. cube/level) touched
rows.short_description: Hides subject from divinations and all forms of sight (as invisibility); creatures become comatose; tactile/ devices may still detect. Material: basilisk eyelash, gum arabic, and whitewash.

rows.name: Shades
rows.short_description: As shadow conjuration but duplicates sorcerer/wizard conjurations of 8th level or lower at 80% reality vs. nonbelievers; nondamaging effects 80% likely.

rows.name: Shadow Conjuration
rows.saving_throw: Will disbelief (if interacted with); varies; see text
rows.short_description: Duplicates sorcerer/wizard conjuration (summoning or creation) spells of 3rd or lower at 20% reality vs. nonbelievers; disbelief reduces damage to 20% and effects to 20% likelihood; SR applies even if original spell doesn’t.

rows.name: Shadow Conjuration, Greater
rows.short_description: As shadow conjuration but duplicates conjurations of 6th level or lower at 60% reality vs. nonbelievers.

rows.name: Shadow Evocation
rows.short_description: Duplicates sorcerer/wizard evocation spells of 4th or lower; disbelief reduces damage to 20% and other effects to 20% or 1/5 strength; SR and saves use this spell’s level.

rows.name: Shadow Evocation, Greater
rows.short_description: As shadow evocation but duplicates evocation spells of 7th level or lower at 60% damage/effect vs. nonbelievers.

rows.name: Shadow Walk
rows.short_description: From shadowy area, transport to the Plane of Shadow border; travel ~50 mph relative to Material; endpoint imprecise (1d10×100 ft. off); can reach other planes bordering Shadow after 1d4 hours transit.

rows.name: Shambler
rows.effect: 1d4+2 shambling mounds (11 HD), no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.duration: Seven days or seven months (D); see text
rows.short_description: Creates shambling mounds that serve for 7 days (or 7 months as site guards). Guard-duty shamblers can’t leave creation range; gain fire resistance only in damp terrain.

rows.name: Shapechange
rows.short_description: As polymorph but any single nonunique creature form (Fine–Colossal) with HD ≤ caster level (max 25), including incorporeal/gaseous; gain Ex & Su abilities and new type; change forms each round as free action; focus: jade circlet (≥1,500 gp).

rows.name: Shatter
rows.target: One solid object or one crystalline creature; see text
rows.saving_throw: Will negates (object) or Fortitude half (creature); see text
rows.short_description: Area: breaks fragile nonmagical crystal/glass/ceramics ≤ 1 lb./level. Target: destroy one nonmagical solid object ≤ 10 lb./level. Against crystalline creatures: 1d6 sonic/level (max 10d6), Fort half. Material: mica chip.

rows.name: Shield
rows.short_description: Invisible force disk gives +4 shield bonus to AC (applies vs. incorporeal touch) and negates magic missile; no armor check or ASF; can’t be used for cover.

rows.name: Shield of Faith
rows.short_description: Grants +2 deflection to AC, +1/6 levels (max +5). Material: small parchment with holy text.

rows.name: Shield of Law
rows.targets: One creature/level in a 20-ft.-radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: Subjects gain +4 deflection AC and +4 resistance saves; SR 25 vs. chaotic spells/casters; blocks possession/mental control; chaotic attackers that hit are slowed (Will negates). Focus: 500 gp reliquary.

rows.name: Shield Other
rows.short_description: Target gains +1 deflection AC and +1 resistance saves; you take half of its hp damage; non-hp harm unaffected; ends if out of range. Focus: pair of platinum rings (≥50 gp each) worn by both.

rows.name: Shillelagh
rows.target: One touched nonmagical oak club or quarterstaff
rows.short_description: Your own club or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon; deals damage as if two size categories larger while you wield it; otherwise behaves normally.

rows.name: Shocking Grasp
rows.short_description: Melee touch deals 1d6 electricity/level (max 5d6); +3 to hit if target is in/of/carrying much metal.

rows.name: Shout
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude partial or Reflex negates (object); see text
rows.short_description: Cone deals 5d6 sonic (Fort half) and deafens 2d6 rounds (save negates deafness). Brittle/crystalline creatures/objects take 1d6/level (max 15d6); objects can be protected by Reflex save. Blocked by silence.

rows.name: Shout, Greater
rows.saving_throw: Fortitude partial or Reflex negates (object); see text
rows.short_description: As shout but 10d6 sonic (or 1d6/level, max 20d6 vs brittle/crystal), stuns 1 round and deafens 4d6 rounds (Fort halves damage and deafness and negates stun). Focus: small horn.

rows.name: Shrink Item
rows.target: One nonmagical object up to 2 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: Shrink item to 1/16 size in each dimension (optional clothlike); restore by command or impact; permanency allows repeated use by caster only.

rows.name: Silence
rows.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a creature, object, or point
rows.saving_throw: Will negates; see text or none (object)
rows.short_description: No sound in area; blocks verbal components and sonic/language effects; can be centered on creature or object; unwilling creature may save/SR.

rows.name: Silent Image
rows.effect: Visual figment up to four 10-ft. cubes + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
rows.short_description: Creates silent, scentless visual illusion you can move within size limits. Focus: fleece.

rows.name: Simulacrum
rows.short_description: Creates half-HD illusory duplicate from ice/snow; under your absolute command; can’t gain levels; repairs require 24h and 100 gp per hp in a lab. Material: piece of creature and powdered ruby worth 100 gp/HD. XP Cost: 100 XP/HD (min 1,000 XP).

rows.name: Slay Living
rows.short_description: Melee touch can kill; on successful Fort save deals 3d6 +1/level damage instead (may still kill).

rows.name: Sleep
rows.area: One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: Puts 4 HD of creatures to sleep (lowest HD first). Slapping or wounding awakens; doesn’t affect unconscious, constructs, or undead. Material: fine sand, rose petals, or a live cricket.

rows.name: Sleet Storm
rows.short_description: Blocks all sight (even darkvision); ground becomes icy—Balance DC 10 to move at half speed or fall; extinguishes small flames. Material: pinch of dust and a few drops of water.

rows.name: Slow
rows.targets: One creature/level, no two more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Each target can take only a move or standard action each turn; –1 attack, AC, Reflex; speed halved; counters/dispels haste. Material: drop of molasses.

rows.name: Snare
rows.target: Nonmagical circle of vine/rope/thong 2 ft. + 2 ft./level diameter
rows.short_description: Concealed magical snare traps limbs; with a strong tree, snaps up for 1d6 damage and hoists; otherwise entangles. Escape DC 23 (Str or Escape Artist, full-round). Snare AC 7, hp 5.

rows.name: Soften Earth and Stone
rows.short_description: Turns earth to mud or sand, and stone to soft clay; mud may trap (Ref or stuck 1d2 rounds); affects ceilings/cliffs causing collapses; can undermine structures.

rows.name: Solid Fog
rows.short_description: As fog cloud plus movement reduced to 5 ft./round, –2 on melee attacks/damage; prevents most ranged attacks; reduces falling damage by 1d6 per 10 ft. of fog; only severe wind disperses (1 round). Material: powdered peas and hoof.

rows.name: Song of Discord
rows.short_description: Targets turn on each other: each round 50% chance to attack nearest creature; otherwise act normally; won’t harm unconscious targets.

rows.name: Soul Bind
rows.short_description: Traps a newly dead creature’s soul in a black sapphire, preventing all forms of return (even miracle/wish) until gem is destroyed or spell dispelled. Focus: black sapphire worth ≥1,000 gp per HD.

rows.name: Sound Burst
rows.short_description: Deals 1d8 sonic in area; Fort save negates 1-round stun (creatures that cannot hear are not stunned). Focus: musical instrument.

rows.name: Speak with Animals
rows.short_description: You can communicate with animals; attitude governs cooperation; information limited by animal intellect.

rows.name: Speak with Dead
rows.short_description: Corpse answers 1 question/2 levels based on knowledge in life; alignment difference allows Will save; body must be mostly intact; not true contact with soul; fails if used within past week; doesn’t affect undead.

rows.name: Speak with Plants
rows.short_description: You can communicate with normal and plant creatures; info limited to their senses; attitude governs cooperation.

rows.name: Spectral Hand
rows.short_description: Ghostly hand (hp = 1d4 you lost) delivers your touch spells of 4th or lower at range with +2 on touch attacks; incorporeal with improved evasion; AC ≥22 (uses your saves; Int mod as Dex).

rows.name: Spell Immunity
rows.short_description: Target is immune to one specified spell per 4 caster levels (spells of 4th or lower). Doesn’t cover Su/Ex abilities; applies to spell-like abilities too. Only one spell immunity/greater may apply at a time.

rows.name: Spell Immunity, Greater
rows.short_description: As spell immunity but protects against specified spells of 8th level or lower. Only one spell immunity/greater may apply at a time.

rows.name: Spell Resistance
rows.short_description: Grants SR equal to 12 + your caster level.

rows.name: Spellstaff
rows.short_description: Store one spell you can cast in a wooden quarterstaff (only one spell/staff and only one active spellstaff). You can later cast it as if prepared; material components are consumed when stored. Focus: the staff.

rows.name: Spell Turning
rows.short_description: Turns back 1d4+6 spell levels of spells that specifically target you (not touch, area, or effect spells). Partial turning splits effect proportionally when remaining levels are fewer than incoming spell level. Two opposing spell turnings can resonate with special results (often null). Material: small silver mirror.

rows.name: Spider Climb
rows.short_description: Subject gains 20-ft. climb speed, can traverse vertical surfaces and ceilings without Climb checks; retains Dex bonus to AC while climbing; cannot run while climbing. Material: drop of bitumen and a live spider eaten by the subject.

rows.name: Spike Growth
rows.short_description: Ground-covering vegetation (or roots in bare earth) hardens into spikes. Creatures moving on foot take 1d4 piercing per 5 ft. and on a failed Reflex save have land speed halved for 24h (cure or Heal check removes). Magic trap; Search DC 25 + spell level to find (DC 28; DC 27 if cast by ranger).

rows.name: Spike Stones
rows.short_description: Stone shapes into camouflaged spikes. Movement on foot is half speed; each 5 ft. moved deals 1d8 piercing; failed Reflex also halves speed for 24h (cure/Heal removes). Magic trap; Search DC 25 + spell level (DC 29) to find; cannot be disabled by Disable Device.

rows.name: Spiritual Weapon
rows.short_description: Floating force weapon attacks designated foe: 1d8 force +1/3 levels (max +5), uses your BAB and Wis mod, can make multiple attacks in later rounds, redirected as a move action. Strikes as a spell (bypasses DR), hits incorporeal; SR checked on first hit only. Dispel/disintegrate etc. can end it.

rows.name: Statue
rows.short_description: Subject becomes solid stone (hardness 8), retains own hp, senses mostly normal, no need to eat/breathe. Can free-action switch between statue and normal form during duration. Material: lime, sand, and water stirred with iron.

rows.name: Status
rows.targets: One living creature touched per three levels
rows.short_description: Know direction, distance, and general condition (wounded, dying, panicked, poisoned, etc.) of multiple allies on same plane. Ends for a subject that dies or leaves the plane.

rows.name: Stinking Cloud
rows.short_description: Fog cloud that nauseates living creatures while inside and for 1d4+1 rounds after leaving (new save each round if remaining). Can be made permanent; dispersed cloud reforms in 10 minutes. Material: rotten egg or skunk-cabbage leaves.

rows.name: Stone Shape
rows.target: Stone or stone object touched, up to 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: Reshape existing stone into any crude form (doors, coffers, traps). Fine detail not possible; 30% chance moving parts don’t work. Material: soft clay formed to rough shape then pressed to stone.

rows.name: Stoneskin
rows.short_description: DR 10/adamantine up to total prevented damage of 10/level (max 150), then ends. Material: granite and 250 gp diamond dust sprinkled on target.

rows.name: Stone Tell
rows.short_description: Speak with natural or worked stone; stones report who/what touched them and what lies behind/under them (limited by their perception).

rows.name: Stone to Flesh
rows.target: One petrified creature or a cylinder of stone (1–3 ft. diameter, up to 10 ft. long)
rows.short_description: Restores a petrified creature (DC 15 Fort save to survive the process); or converts stone into inert flesh (e.g., stone golem → flesh golem, statue → corpse). Material: pinch of earth and a drop of blood.

rows.name: Storm of Vengeance
rows.short_description: Round 1: Fort save or deafened 1d4×10 min. Round 2: acid rain 1d6 (no save). Round 3: six 10d6 lightning bolts (Ref half). Round 4: hail 5d6 bludgeoning (no save). Rounds 5–10: heavy rain/winds—vision ≤5 ft., concealment beyond; speed quartered; ranged attacks impossible; casting requires Concentration check vs. save DC + spell level.

rows.name: Suggestion
rows.short_description: Influence a target with a seemingly reasonable course of action described in 1–2 sentences; self-harm suggestions fail. Material: snake’s tongue and honeycomb or sweet oil.

rows.name: Suggestion, Mass
rows.targets: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As suggestion, but affects multiple targets with the same suggestion.

rows.name: Summon Instrument
rows.short_description: A typical handheld instrument appears in your hands or at your feet; it plays only for you; cannot summon very large instruments.

rows.name: Summon Monster I
rows.short_description: Summons an extraplanar creature from the 1st-level list to fight for you; obeys your commands if communicated; summoned creatures can’t summon or teleport. Alignments add descriptors. Focus: tiny bag and small candle.

rows.name: Summon Monster II
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 2nd-level list, or 1d3 from 1st-level list (same kind).

rows.name: Summon Monster III
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 3rd-level list; or 1d3 from 2nd; or 1d4+1 from 1st.

rows.name: Summon Monster IV
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 4th-level list; or 1d3 from 3rd; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Monster V
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 5th-level list; or 1d3 from 4th; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Monster VI
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 6th-level list; or 1d3 from 5th; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Monster VII
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 7th-level list; or 1d3 from 6th; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Monster VIII
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 8th-level list; or 1d3 from 7th; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Monster IX
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 9th-level list; or 1d3 from 8th; or 1d4+1 from lower list.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally I
rows.short_description: Summons a natural creature from the 1st-level list to fight for you. Creatures can’t summon/teleport. Aquatic creatures only in suitable environments. Descriptors match alignment/element of the creature summoned.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally II
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 2nd-level list; or 1d3 from 1st-level list (same kind).

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally III
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 3rd-level list; or 1d3 from 2nd; or 1d4+1 from 1st.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally IV
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 4th-level list; or 1d3 from 3rd; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally V
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 5th-level list; or 1d3 from 4th; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally VI
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 6th-level list; or 1d3 from 5th; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally VII
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 7th-level list; or 1d3 from 6th; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally VIII
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 8th-level list; or 1d3 from 7th; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Nature’s Ally IX
rows.short_description: 1 creature from 9th-level list; or 1d3 from 8th; or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures.

rows.name: Summon Swarm
rows.effect: One swarm of bats, rats, or spiders
rows.short_description: Summons a bat/rat/spider swarm that attacks all creatures in its area; you don’t control its targets or movement if no foes are present. Material: square of red cloth.

rows.name: Sunbeam
rows.duration: 1 round/level or until all beams are exhausted
rows.saving_throw: Reflex negates and Reflex half; see text
rows.short_description: Each round, fire a line that blinds and deals 4d6 (Ref halves and negates blindness); sunlight-vulnerable take double. Undead take 1d6/level (max 20d6; Ref half) and light-vulnerable undead are destroyed on failed save. Also harms fungi/molds/oozes as if undead.

rows.name: Sunburst
rows.short_description: Blinds and deals 6d6 to creatures in area (Ref halves and negates blindness); sunlight-vulnerable take double. Undead take 1d6/level (max 25d6; Ref half) and light-vulnerable undead are destroyed on failed save. Hurts fungi/molds/oozes; dispels darkness < 9th. Material: sunstone piece and a flame.

rows.name: Symbol of Death
rows.short_description: When triggered, kills creatures within 60 ft. up to a total of 150 current hp (closest first); active for 10 min./level or until 150 hp affected. Visible, must be in plain sight; extensive trigger options/passwords/attuning; magic trap (Search/Disable DC 25 + spell level = 33). Material: costly mercury/phosphorus + powdered diamond & opal (≥5,000 gp each).

rows.name: Symbol of Fear
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. become panicked for 1 round/level when triggered. Magic trap (Search/Disable DC 25 + spell level = 31). Material: mercury and phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥1,000 gp total).

rows.name: Symbol of Insanity
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. become permanently insane (as insanity). No hp limit; once triggered, active for 10 min./level. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 33. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥5,000 gp).

rows.name: Symbol of Pain
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. suffer –4 on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks for 1 hour after leaving 60 ft. No hp limit; once triggered, active for 10 min./level. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 30. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥1,000 gp).

rows.name: Symbol of Persuasion
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. are charmed by you (as charm monster) for 1 hour/level. No hp limit; once triggered, active for 10 min./level. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 31. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥5,000 gp).

rows.name: Symbol of Sleep
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures of 10 HD or less within 60 ft. fall into catatonic slumber for 3d6×10 minutes (nonmagically unawakenable). No hp limit; once triggered, active for 10 min./level. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 30. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥1,000 gp).

rows.name: Symbol of Stunning
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. are stunned for 1d6 rounds. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 32. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥5,000 gp).

rows.name: Symbol of Weakness
rows.short_description: As symbol of death, but creatures within 60 ft. take 3d6 Strength damage. No hp limit; once triggered, active for 10 min./level. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 32. Material: mercury & phosphorus plus powdered diamond & opal (≥5,000 gp).

rows.name: Sympathetic Vibration
rows.short_description: Attune a freestanding structure (building/bridge/dam) to take 2d10 damage/round (hardness ignored) for up to duration; fails if not freestanding. Affects objects, not creatures/constructs. Focus: tuning fork.

rows.name: Sympathy
rows.target: One location (up to a 10-ft. cube/level) or one object
rows.short_description: Object or area attracts a named specific kind of intelligent creature or a specific alignment; overwhelming urge to stay/touch. On a successful save, creature resaves 1d6×10 minutes later. Counters/dispels antipathy. Material: crushed pearls (1,500 gp) & a drop of honey.

rows.name: Tasha’s Hideous Laughter
rows.short_description: Target collapses into uncontrollable laughter (prone; no actions; not helpless). Creatures Int 2 or lower unaffected; different type than caster gets +4 on save. Material: tiny tarts (thrown) and a waved feather.

rows.name: Telekinesis
rows.duration: Concentration (up to 1 round/level) or instantaneous; see text
rows.saving_throw: Will negates (object) or None; see text
rows.short_description: Move/manipulate objects up to 25 lb./level (max 375) at 20 ft./round; or each round do bull rush/disarm/grapple/trip using CL and Int/Cha; or one-round violent thrust hurling items/creatures (attack rolls required; creatures get Will negates).

rows.name: Teleport
rows.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
rows.short_description: Instantly transports you and gear plus limited allies up to 100 miles/level on same plane; accuracy depends on familiarity (on target/off target/similar area/mishap).

rows.name: Teleport Object
rows.target: One touched object of up to 50 lb./level and 3 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: As teleport but for objects only; can send to a distant Ethereal location; targeted dispel magic at the origin point returns the item.

rows.name: Teleport, Greater
rows.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
rows.short_description: As teleport, but unlimited range on the same plane and no off-target chance; can teleport to unseen places with reliable description; insufficient/misleading info causes no effect.

rows.name: Teleportation Circle
rows.effect: 5-ft.-radius circle that teleports those who activate it
rows.short_description: Creates subtle floor circle that teleports creatures standing on it to a fixed destination (as greater teleport). Can be permanent. Magic trap; Search/Disable DC 34. Material: amber dust to cover circle (1,000 gp).

rows.name: Temporal Stasis
rows.short_description: Subject enters suspended animation; time ceases for it and it cannot be harmed until freed (dispel magic or freedom). Material: powdered diamond/emerald/ruby/sapphire (≥5,000 gp).

rows.name: Tenser's Floating Disk
rows.short_description: Creates a slightly concave disk of force that follows you, hovers ~3 ft. above ground, and carries up to 100 lb./level; winks out if beyond range or too far from a surface. Material: a drop of mercury.

rows.name: Tenser's Transformation
rows.short_description: You become a combat machine: +4 enhancement to Str, Dex, Con; +4 natural armor; +5 competence on Fort saves; BAB equals character level; proficiency with all simple and martial weapons; you cannot cast spells or use spell-activation/completion items. Material: potion of bull’s strength (drunk).

rows.name: Time Stop
rows.short_description: You act for 1d4+1 rounds while others seem frozen; you can’t target creatures or their possessions, but can set up defenses or area spells that persist after the effect ends; you’re undetectable and can’t enter antimagic fields.

rows.name: Tongues
rows.short_description: Subject can speak and understand any intelligent creature’s language (one spoken at a time); can be made permanent. Arcane material: small clay ziggurat (shatters).

rows.name: Touch of Fatigue
rows.short_description: Melee touch fatigues a creature for the duration; no effect if it’s already fatigued; ends when duration expires. Material: a drop of sweat.

rows.name: Touch of Idiocy
rows.short_description: Melee touch imposes 1d6 penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha (not below 1), possibly preventing spellcasting.

rows.name: Transmute Metal to Wood
rows.area: All metal objects within a 40-ft. radius burst
rows.short_description: Turns all metal in area to wood; magic metal has SR 20 + CL; artifacts unaffected. Weapons/armor suffer penalties and break risks; only limited wish/miracle/wish can restore metal.

rows.name: Transmute Mud to Rock
rows.short_description: Turns mud or quicksand into soft stone; creatures in mud can Reflex save to escape; counters/dispelled by transmute rock to mud. Components: sand, lime, and water.

rows.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
rows.short_description: Turns natural, unworked rock into mud (depth ≤10 ft.); hampers movement; cave-ins if cast on ceilings (8d6, Reflex half); won’t affect worked or magical stone; mud can dry to dirt over days. Components: clay and water.

rows.name: Transport via Plants
rows.target: You and touched objects or other touched willing creatures
rows.short_description: Enter a living plant and emerge from another plant of the same kind any distance away; can designate direction/distance; can bring objects and limited creatures; plant creatures can’t be used; destroyed entry plant slays occupants.

rows.name: Trap the Soul
rows.short_description: Imprisons a creature’s life force in a gem either by casting with a final word (SR/Will; name boosts DC and ignores SR) or by tricking with a prepared trigger object (no SR or save). Material: gem worth 1,000 gp/HD; Focus: prepared trigger object (for that method).

rows.name: Tree Shape
rows.short_description: Assume form of a Large tree/shrub or dead trunk; you appear as a normal tree, retain senses, +10 natural armor, Dex 0, speed 0, immune to crits; detect magic reveals faint transmutation; can dismiss as a free action.

rows.name: Tree Stride
rows.duration: 1 hour/level or until expended; see text
rows.short_description: Enter a tree and step between trees of the same kind within listed ranges (up to 3,000 ft. for oaks/ash/yew); up to once per caster level; each transport is a full-round action; slain if your tree is destroyed before you exit.

rows.name: True Resurrection
rows.short_description: As raise dead but can restore life to a creature dead up to 10 years/level and to those whose bodies are destroyed if unambiguously identified; restores to full health with no level or Con loss; can revive victims of death effects or destroyed undead; cannot undo death by old age. Material: holy water and diamonds worth ≥ 25,000 gp.

rows.name: True Seeing
rows.short_description: Subject sees things as they are: through darkness, magical concealment, invisibility, polymorphs, and into the Ethereal (not extradimensional spaces); range 120 ft; doesn’t penetrate solid objects or negate mundane concealment/disguises; can’t be enhanced. Material: ointment for the eyes costing 250 gp.

rows.name: True Strike
rows.short_description: Your next single attack roll before the end of the next round gains a +20 insight bonus and ignores concealment miss chance. Focus: small wooden replica of an archery target.

rows.name: Undeath to Death
rows.area: Several undead creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
rows.short_description: As circle of death, but destroys undead creatures in the area. Material: diamond powder worth at least 500 gp.

rows.name: Undetectable Alignment
rows.short_description: Conceals the alignment of a creature or object from all forms of divination.

rows.name: Unhallow
rows.area: 40-ft. radius emanating from the touched point
rows.short_description: Makes a site unholy: magic circle against good; –4 to turning checks to turn undead (+4 to rebuke); may tie one spell effect to the site for 1 year; counters (but doesn’t dispel) hallow. Costly materials required.

rows.name: Unholy Aura
rows.target: One creature/level in a 20-ft. radius burst centered on you
rows.short_description: +4 deflection to AC and +4 resistance on saves; SR 25 vs good magic; blocks possession/mental influence; good melee attackers take 1d6 Str damage (Fort negates). Focus: tiny reliquary (≥ 500 gp).

rows.name: Unholy Blight
rows.short_description: Greasy darkness harms good and neutral creatures: good take 1d8/2 levels (max 5d8), or 1d6/level (max 10d6) if good outsider, and are sickened 1d4 rounds (Will half and negates sickened); neutrals take half damage (Will quarter) and aren’t sickened; remove curse ends sickened.

rows.name: Unseen Servant
rows.short_description: Invisible force performs simple tasks; Str 2, speed 15 ft; can’t attack; dissipates after taking 6 damage; can’t be sent beyond range. Materials: piece of string and a bit of wood.

rows.name: Vampiric Touch
rows.short_description: Melee touch deals 1d6 damage per two caster levels (max 10d6) and grants you temporary HP equal to damage dealt (not exceeding target’s current HP +10) for 1 hour.

rows.name: Veil
rows.target: One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: Change the appearance of any number of subjects; +10 bonus to Disguise to mimic a specific individual; unwilling targets get Will save/SR; observers who interact may attempt Will disbelief.

rows.name: Ventriloquism
rows.short_description: Project your voice (or a vocal sound) from another location; listeners who save recognize it as illusory. Focus: parchment rolled into a small cone.

rows.name: Virtue
rows.short_description: Subject gains 1 temporary hit point.

rows.name: Vision
rows.short_description: As legend lore but faster and requiring a caster level check (DC 20/25/30 based on familiarity) to receive a vision; information may be incomplete or vague. XP Cost: 100 XP.

rows.name: Wail of the Banshee
rows.area: One living creature/level within a 40-ft.-radius spread
rows.short_description: Terrible scream slays creatures in the area (closest first) unless they succeed on Fortitude saves.

rows.name: Wall of Fire
rows.effect: Opaque sheet of flame up to 20 ft. long/level or a ring of fire with a radius of up to 5 ft. per two levels; either form 20 ft. high
rows.short_description: Blazing curtain deals heat damage to nearby creatures each round; passing through deals 2d6 +1/level (max +20); double damage to undead; 20 cold damage in 1 round extinguishes a 5-ft. length; can be permanent via permanency. Material: small piece of phosphorus.

rows.name: Wall of Force
rows.effect: Wall whose area is up to one 10-ft. square/level
rows.short_description: Invisible barrier immune to damage and most spells; destroyed by disintegrate, rod of cancellation, sphere of annihilation, or Mordenkainen’s disjunction; blocks ethereal and material; shape as a continuous plane; can be made permanent. Material: pinch of clear gem powder.

rows.name: Wall of Ice
rows.effect: Anchored plane of ice, up to one 10-ft. square/level, or hemisphere of ice with a radius of up to 3 ft. + 1 ft./level
rows.short_description: Creates a strong ice plane (1 in./level thick) or hemisphere; can be broken; fire melts it (full damage), creating steamy fog for 10 minutes; plane inflicts cold damage when stepped through. Material: small piece of quartz or rock crystal.

rows.name: Wall of Iron
rows.effect: Iron wall whose area is up to one 5-ft. square/level; see text
rows.short_description: Conjures a flat iron wall (1 in./4 levels thick; can double area by halving thickness); HP and break DC scale with thickness; can be tipped with a DC 40 Strength check; subject to rust and perforation. Material: sheet iron plus 1 lb. of gold dust (50 gp).

rows.name: Wall of Stone
rows.effect: Stone wall whose area is up to one 5-ft. square/level (S)
rows.short_description: Creates a stone wall (1 in./4 levels thick) that merges into existing stone; can be shaped; can bridge spans with supports; HP and break DC scale by thickness; can entrap on failed Reflex save; destroyed by disintegrate or mundane means. Material: small block of granite.

rows.name: Wall of Thorns
rows.effect: Wall of thorny brush, up to one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
rows.short_description: Dense thorn barrier deals slashing damage per round of movement equal to 25 − target’s AC (Dex/dodge excluded); creatures can force through with Strength checks; mundane fire ineffective, magical fire burns it away in 10 minutes; not a living plant.

rows.name: Warp Wood
rows.target: 1 Small wooden object/level, all within a 20-ft. radius
rows.short_description: Warps wood, ruining form and strength (doors open or jam; ranged weapons useless; melee weapons −4 attack). Can also unwarp previously warped wood; multiple castings may be needed for very large objects.

rows.name: Water Breathing
rows.short_description: Subjects can breathe water; divide total duration evenly among all touched; doesn’t prevent breathing air. Arcane material: short reed or straw.

rows.name: Water Walk
rows.short_description: Subjects can move across liquids as if solid; if submerged, rise at 60 ft./round until they reach the surface.

rows.name: Waves of Exhaustion
rows.short_description: All living creatures in area become exhausted; no effect on creatures already exhausted.

rows.name: Waves of Fatigue
rows.short_description: All living creatures in area become fatigued; no effect on creatures already fatigued.

rows.name: Web
rows.short_description: Mass of sticky webs entangles creatures; must be anchored to opposite points; escape by STR 20 or Escape Artist 25; movement through is slow; webs are flammable; can be made permanent. Material: bit of spider web.

rows.name: Weird
rows.target: Any number of creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
rows.short_description: As phantasmal killer but affects multiple targets; on successful Fort save, target still takes 3d6 damage, is stunned 1 round, and takes 1d4 temporary Strength damage.

rows.name: Whirlwind
rows.effect: Cyclone 10 ft. wide at base, 30 ft. wide at top, and 30 ft. tall
rows.short_description: Create and control a fast-moving cyclone (speed 60 ft./round) that can damage and pick up Medium or smaller creatures; loses control beyond range.

rows.name: Whispering Wind
rows.duration: No more than 1 hour/level or until discharged (destination is reached)
rows.short_description: Sends a whisper-quiet message (≤25 words) or sound to a familiar location by following available paths; speed adjustable; waits and delivers on arrival.

rows.name: Wind Walk
rows.target: You and one touched creature per three levels
rows.short_description: Subjects become misty and mobile like gaseous form; fly 10 ft. (perfect) or waft up to ~60 mph (poor); can resume physical form and back (5 rounds each); automatic descent during last minute warns of end.

rows.name: Wind Wall
rows.effect: Wall up to 10 ft./level long and 5 ft./level high (S)
rows.short_description: Vertical curtain of strong wind blows away tiny flyers, deflects arrows/bolts, hampers gases and gaseous forms; can be shaped to enclose areas. Materials: tiny fan and an exotic feather.

rows.name: Wish
rows.short_description: Alters reality within limits: duplicate lower-level spells (even prohibited schools within limits), undo harmful effects, create items, grant inherent bonuses, heal/remove afflictions to many, revive dead, transport across planes, or force rerolls. Greater effects may be perverted by the DM. XP Cost: minimum 5,000 XP (more for duplicating XP-cost spells or item creation) and costly components as required.

rows.name: Wood Shape
rows.target: One touched piece of wood no larger than 10 cu. ft. + 1 cu. ft./level
rows.short_description: Shapes existing wood into a useful form (doors, weapons, traps, etc.); fine detail not possible; 30% chance moving parts don’t work.

rows.name: Word of Chaos
rows.area: Nonchaotic creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
rows.saving_throw: None or Will negates; see text
rows.short_description: Nonchaotic creatures suffer deafness, stun, confusion, or death based on HD; on your home plane, nonchaotic extraplanar creatures are banished (Will −4). Creatures with HD > your caster level are unaffected.

rows.name: Word of Recall
rows.target: You and touched objects or other willing creatures
rows.short_description: Teleports you (and limited cargo/companions) to a predesignated sanctuary within the same plane; unwilling creatures and attended items get saves/SR.

rows.name: Zone of Silence
rows.short_description: You and others inside can converse normally, but no sound escapes; blocks sonic/language-dependent effects from exiting; moves with you; lip-reading can still reveal speech.

rows.name: Zone of Truth
rows.short_description: Creatures in area cannot speak deliberate lies; subjects know of the effect and may be evasive while remaining truthful; leaving ends the effect for that creature.
